div.l:
yo nirmāti bibharti saṃharati ca krīḍānukampādibhir
nirdehas trijagatpramāṇapariṣatkhyāto yadicchāṃ vinā |
dātuṃ śaknuvate kadā cana phalaṃ karmāṇi no kutra cid
vikhyātaḥ parameśvaraḥ sa tanutād vāgvaibhavaṃ vo vibhuḥ || 1 ||

vidyātīrthavihāraśālini paraṃ śrīśāradāsaṃśraye
kauberyā harito lalāṭatilake kaśmīradeśe 'bhaye |
yacchrīpadmapuraṃ purandarapuraprodyatprabhaṃ bhāsate
tatrācāryavaro babhūva bhagavān somaḥ sa somaprabhaḥ || 2 ||

yas siddhāmṛtaśambhudarśitamahāvidyaḥ satāṃ mastakaḥ
śāpānugrahatas tatāna paramaḥ somas tadīye 'nvaye |
vidyāvān avatārakaḥ samuditaḥ sūryodaye 'rbodaye
dhenūnāṃ pradadau sahasram amalaṃ cakre yaśaś candrikām || 3 ||

tatputraḥ sa manoharo guruvaro yajñair mahādakṣiṇair
indratvagrahaśaṅkayā surapater bhītiṃ tatāna sphuṭam |
tatputraḥ sa ca sodakaḥ samabhavad vedāntasiddhāntavid
dhyāyaṃ dhyāyam iyāya devasadanaṃ devaṃ mṛḍānīpatim || 4 ||

sa śrīmān udapādi yodhakagurur yaddīkṣayā bhūbhujaḥ
prājyaṃ rājyam apāstavairinikarās samyak ciraṃ cakrire |
bhrātā yasya babhūva sarvaviditaḥ śrīkaṇṭharājānakaḥ
śāpānugrahakṛd vicāracaturo yaḥ siddhatāṃ śiśriye || 5 ||

yodhācāryasuto 'rjuno 'jani mahālakṣmīnivāso yato
jāto 'haṃ śitikaṇṭhako 'nv ayam ahaṃ prāpa guroḥ śrīvarāt |
nānāśāstravinirṇayāya bahuśas tīrthāntarāṇy abhramaṃ
pūjāṃ gūrjaranāthamahmadasuratrāṇād avāpaṃ parām || 6 ||

śrīgorakṣapure 'dhigamya vibudhāt tarkaṃ paraṃ karkaśaṃ
śrīnāthād adhikāśi śeṣaracitaṃ mīmāṃsayā māṃsalam |
bhāṣyaṃ śrīvaradeśvarāc ca jayinā kaśmīrabhūmībhujā
śrīkaṇṭhena sahodareṇa ca yataḥ saṃprārthito 'smi svayam || 7 ||

yo bālabodhinyabhidhāṃ budhendro
jagaddharo yāṃ vitatāna vṛttim |
tannaptṛkanyātanayātanūjo
vyākhyāmi tāṃ śrīśitikaṇṭhako 'lpam || 8 ||

tatsamprārthanayānayā nayavidāṃ durge 'pi mārge mayā
cāpalyaṃ yad akāri tat kṛtadhiyo yūyaṃ kṣamadhvaṃ budhāḥ |
hāraṃ hāram ahārya mohamahitaṃ śabdārthayoḥ saṅgatiṃ
kāraṃ kāram idaṃ bhavadbhir abhito rakṣyaṃ gṛhītakṣaṇaiḥ || 9 ||

grāme grāme 'grahārān maṭhadharaṇiyutān karmaṭhebhyaḥ kaṭhebhyaḥ
sabhyebhyo yo vyatārīd ripugurunagarīr yo garīyān abhaitsīt |
akṣāṇyakṣīṇaśaktir vyavahṛticaturo yo vyajaiṣīc ca tasmin
bhūjānau hassanākhye bhuvam avati mayā tanyate grantha eṣaḥ || 10 ||

sarvakṣmāpatimaulihāritanavaprājyasvarājyaḥ paraṃ
tattvātattvavicārakāridhiṣaṇo gāmbhīryaśauryānvitaḥ |
kaśmīrādhipatiḥ kṛpājalanidhir vikhyātakīrtiś citaṃ
jīyād haidaraśāhisūnur anaghaḥ kandarpadarpāpahaḥ || 11 ||
div.p: sadācārānumitaśrutipratipāditakartavyatākaṃ prāripsitaprabandhapratibandhakavighnaughavighātakārakaṃ namaskāraṃ parameśvaragocaraṃ praṇināya granthakāraḥ ||
div.l:
oṁ | namaś śivāya niśśeṣakleśapraśamaśāline |
triguṇagranthidurbhedabhavabandhavibhedine ||
div.p:
śivāya parameśvarāya namo 'stv iti sambandhaḥ | atra yady api yatrānyat kriyāpadaṃ nāsti tatrāstir bhavantīparaḥ prayoktavya iti vacanād astīty asyādhyāhāraprayogaḥ prāpnoti | tathāpi bahutaraduẖkhānanubandhitve kṛtijanyatve ca satīṣṭasādhanatāyāṃ vidhāv anumatyādāv arthe pañcamī | parasmaipadaprathamapuruṣaikavacanānto 'stir itarapadārthasaṃsarge parapadārthaniṣṭhātyantābhāvaprayogitāvacchedakadharmaśūnyatālakṣaṇayā yogyatayā sambandhanīyaḥ | tathā ca prayogaḥ |
trilokyām iha kas trātas tritāpyā nopatāpitaḥ |
tasmai namo 'stu te yas tvaṃ tannirvāṇāmṛtahrada
iti ||

nanu namaś śabdena svāpakarṣabodhanānukūlo vyāpāraviśeṣo dyotyate | svasyāpakarṣaś cānyotkarṣe sati bhavati | sa eva katham ity ata āha niśśeṣakleṣapraśamaśālina iti | niśśeṣāḥ sūkṣmā asūkṣmāś ca ye kleśāḥ pañcāvidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśās teṣāṃ yaḥ praśamas traikālikābhāvas tena śālī ślāghyaśīlas tasmai | parameśvare kleśānām atyantābhāvaḥ samasti | na svātmani | iti parameśvarasyotkarṣavattvān namaskaraṇīyatvam ity arthaḥ | kleśaśabdasyopalakṣaṇatayā karmavipākāśayagrahaṇe kleśakarmavipākāśayair aparāmṛṣṭāyeśvarāya namo 'stv ity arthaḥ sampadyate | yad vā, kleśaśabdena traya eva rāgadveṣamohā ucyante | asmitābhiniveśayor atraivāntarbhāvavacanāt | śāḍṛ ślāghāyām ity asya bhauvādikasyātmanepadino rūpam | nāmnyajātau ṇinir iti ṇiniḥ ||

nanu parameśvarasya kleśātyantābhāvo 'stu | kiṃ tāvatā namasyatām upayāti | yāvatā yasya yāvat susamīhitadāyitvaṃ nāvasīyate tāvat taṃ ko 'pi na namasyatīty ata āha triguṇagrandhidurbhedabhavabandhavibhedine iti | trayas tritvasaṅkhyākāḥ | ye guṇāḥ prītyaprītiviṣādātmakāḥ sattvarajastamaḥpadārthāḥ ta eva paramatattvasaṅkocadāyitvād granthir iva granthis triguṇā eva triguṇagranthis triguṇīkṛtagranthir iti yāvat | madhyapadalopī samāsaḥ | tena durbhedo durvāro yo bhavo dehendriyaviṣayasambandharūpaḥ saṃsāraḥ sa eva bandho bandhanaṃ taṃ vibhettuṃ śīlam asyeti tathā tasmai | yathā viracitatriguṇagranthir bandho bhettum aśakyas tathāyam api saṃsāras tasyāpi bhedakāyety arthaḥ | paramakāruṇikāt parameśvarād anyena kenacit kadācit kathañcit paramapuruṣārthatām upagato 'tigahanasaṃsārabhedaḥ kartuṃ na śakyate iti tadvidhāyinaḥ parameśvarasyaivāvaśyaṃ praṇatir vidheyā | yāvad asau kadācit kathañcin mamāpi saṃsāraṃ bhetsyatīti bhāvaḥ | namassvastītyādinā caturthī | durbheda ity atreṣaddussuṣvityādinā karmaṇi khal | bandha iti bhāve ghañ ||
yad vā, śivāya nama ity atra muktiphalakaśabdavyutpattirūpaśivadāyitvam asya granthasyācireṇa kālena samastīti prakāśayitum ādyaśloke śivapadaṃ prayuyuje bhaṭṭajagaddharaḥ ||

yad vā, śivāya paramaśivāya namo 'stu | nanu kimarthaṃ paramaśiva eva namasyaḥ | yāvatā brahmādayo 'py asmaduttīrṇās santi te 'pi namaskārakaraṇayogyā iti | nety āha | niśśeṣāḥ samastā ye kleśaṃ prānti pūrayantīti kleśaprāḥ | māyādayaḥ | teṣāṃ śamaḥ | atyantocchedaḥ | tena śālī ślāghyaśīlaḥ | māyādayo 'pi brahmādīnāṃ vidyante | na tu paramaśivasyeti | sa eva bhagavān anavacchinnaprakāśānandasvātantryaparamārthaḥ paramaśiva eva namasyaḥ | yasyaiśvaryaleśakaṇikābhir īśvarībhūtatvaṃ brahmādīnāṃ samastīty arthaḥ | prā pūraṇe ity asmād āto 'nupasargād ḍa iti ḍapratyayaḥ |
yad vā, śāliñśabdo vantvartham āha | tatrabhavadbhiṣ ṭīkākārair uktatvāt |

nanu paramaśivasya māyādyabhāve 'pi kuto hetor namaskāryatvam ity ata āha triguṇītyādi | triguṇānāṃ granthaḥ triguṇagranthaḥ | sa vidyate yeṣāṃ te triguṇagranthinaḥ paramatattvānabhijñāḥ | teṣāṃ yo durbhedo bhavo niścitaparamaśivarūpaviśeṣaḥ kṣettrajñas tasya bandhaḥ svarūpāparijñānaṃ tasya vibhedī vināśakaraḥ | yaiḥ kṣettrajñasya paramaśivatvaṃ na paryajñāyi teṣāṃ kṣettrajñe paramaśivatvaṃ bodhayati paramaśiva iti | sa eva namasya ity arthaḥ | bhedaśabdo viśeṣavācakaḥ | tad uktam |
bhedo dvaidhe viśeṣe syād upajāpe vidāraṇe
iti bhavo vidyate yasyeti bhavaḥ | arśaāditvād acpratyayaḥ |

yad vā, trayo guṇās triguṇāḥ | ta eva grantho dhanaṃ yasya sa triguṇagranthī, tathā | bhavā devādayaḥ sthāvarāntāḥ | māyātattvāntarālaviparivartinaś caturdaśaprakārāḥ | teṣāṃ bandhaś śubhāśubhavāsanātmakaṃ saṃsārakāraṇaṃ kārmaṃ malaṃ tasya vibhedī | apūrṇammanyatābhinnavedyaprathāśubhāśubhavāsanātmakāṇavamāyīyakārmamalasambhave 'pi devādīnāṃ saṃsṛtikāraṇaṃ kārmaṃ malam | tad uktam |
devādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhavināṃ trividhaṃ malam |
tathāpi kārmam evaikaṃ mukhyaṃ saṃsārakāraṇam
iti |
śāstradraviṇayor granthaḥ |

yad vā, niśśeṣāḥ samastā ye kleśaprā jagataḥ kaṣṭapradā andhakādayo 'surāḥ tān śyati tanūkaroti niśśeṣakleśapraśaḥ | sa cāsau maśālī ca | maśabdaś candravācakaḥ |
maś śivaś candramā vedhā mā ca lakṣmīr nigadyate |
iti vacanāt | mena candreṇa śālate iti maśālī candramauliḥ |

yad vā, śivāya parameśvarāya namaḥ karomīti sambandhaḥ | ṇamu prahvatve ity asmād asunpratyayānto namaśśabdo nāvyayaḥ | tasya ca karmatve karomīti padaṃ prayoktavyam | kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavacanā iti karoteḥ prathamaparityāge kāraṇābhāvāt prāthamyenāvilambopasthitikatvāt sarvadhātvarthānuyāyitvāc ca | śivāya kiṃ viśiṣṭāya niśśeṣakleśapraśamaśāline | niśśeṣāṇāṃ viśveṣāṃ saṃsārakhinnānāṃ yaḥ kleśaḥ duẖkham ekaviṃśatiprakāraṃ tasya yaḥ praśamaḥ prakarṣeṇa śāntiḥ tena śālī utkarṣavān tasmai samānādhikaraṇaduẖkhaprāgabhāvāsahavṛttiduẖkhadhvaṃsaprādāyety arthaḥ |
kleśo duḥkhe 'pi rāgādau vyavasāye 'pi ca kvacit |
atra pramāṇam ātmakālādyāvṛttidhvaṃsapratiyogyavṛtti duẖkham | duḥkhaprāgabhāvānadhikaraṇādhikaraṇadhvaṃsapratiyogivṛttikāryamātravṛttidharmatvāt pradīpavad ityādi | anyac ca | kiṃ viśiṣṭāya triguṇagranthidurbhedabhavabandhavibhedine | trayas tritvasaṅkhyākā guṇā nityajñānecchāprayatnā yasya sa triguṇaḥ | tathā granthivad granthināmadheyavyādhivad durbhedo duẖkhena nivāryo yo bhavabandhaḥ saṃsāranidānaṃ dṛḍhabhūmikaṃ savāsanaṃ mithyājñānaṃ tasya vibhedī | avaśyaṃ vināśako na tūpekṣakaḥ | bandha ity atra tu badhyate 'neneti karaṇe ghañ | vibhedīty āvaśyake ṇiniḥ | īśvarasya dehābhāvāt sukhādīnām asiddheḥ sāmānyaguṇānāṃ saṃyogādīnām atrānupayogāt traya eva nityajñānecchāprayatnāḥ saṅgatāḥ | yat tu kaiścij jñānasukhecchāprayatnadharmā īśvare santīty uktaṃ tatra yatno vidheyaḥ |

nanu śivasadbhāve pramāṇavirahāt kasya namaskāryatvam | ucyate, anumānāgamāv atra pramāṇe vidyete | tathā hi adṛṣṭadvārakopādānagocarakṛtyajanyāni | janyāni samavetāny adṛṣṭaprāgabhāvavyāpyaprāgabhāvāpratiyogyupādānagocarā parokṣajñānacikīrṣayā kṛtimajjanyāni samavetatve sati prāgabhāvapratiyogitvāt | yad evaṃ tad evaṃ yathā ghaṭas tathā caitāni tasmād adṛṣṭaprāgabhāvetyādi |
viśvataścakṣur uta viśvatomukho viśvatobāhur uta viśvataspāt |
saṃ bāhubhyāṃ dhamati saṃ patattraiḥ dyāvābhū janayan deva ekaḥ
iti | tathā ca liṅgapurāṇam |
apāṇipādodarapārśvajihvo hy atīndriyo vyāpi susūkṣma ekaḥ |
paśyaty acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoty akarṇo na cāsya buddhaṃ na ca buddhir asti |
sa veda sarvaṃ na ca tasya vettā tam āhur agryaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam
iti |
atra vṛttyanuprāsādayo 'laṅkārāḥ | śivaprabhāvakhyāpanena granthakartuḥ śivaṃ prati ratyākhyo bhāvo 'bhivyajate iti bhāvadhvaniḥ ||

nanu namaskāro maṅgalam ucyate | tac cāmunā granthaṃ praṇinīṣuṇā kimarthaṃ viracitam | samāptiṃ prati kāraṇatvād iti cet, na, anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ samāptiṃ prati kāraṇatvasyāvidyamānatvāt, akṛte 'pi namaskāre pramattānāṃ samāptisadbhāvāt kṛte 'pi namaskāre samāptivirahāt | atha janmāntarīyaṃ maṅgalam iti cet, na, anyonyāśrayāt | abhīṣṭasamāptiṃ prati kāraṇatve nirṇīte janmāntarīyaṃ maṅgalaṃ prakalpyam | kalpite ca tasmin kāraṇatvam iti lokāvagatakāraṇatvenānyathāsiddheś ca | tasmāt samāptiṃ prati kāraṇatvapramāṇābhāvān maṅgalasyākaraṇīyatvam iti cet, na | maṅgalācāro vedamūlakaḥ | avagītaśiṣṭācāratvād darśācāravad ity anumitāyāḥ | maṅgalam abhimatasamāptiṃ prati bodhayitryāḥ śruteḥ pramāṇasya sattvāt | na ca vyabhicāraḥ, avibodhinyā śrutyā maṅgalaṃ samāptisādhanam iti pramāpitatvāt | yatrāpy akṛte maṅgale granthasamāptir dṛśyate tatrāpi tayaiva śrutyā liṅgena janmāntarīyasya maṅgalasyāvaśyam anumānāt | tac cedaṃ maṅgalam ārabdhakarmaṇo 'ṅgaṃ karmārthitayā śiṣṭais tat pūrvaṃ kriyamāṇatvāt phalāntarābhāve sati phalavat karmāripsamāne niyamatas tatpūrvaṃ kriyamāṇatvāt | darśaprayājavad iti | śiṣṭācāramūlakaśrutyanumānābhyāṃ tadarthitayā tatkartavyasya hi bodhanāt tatphalakatvabodhanāc ca | na ca darśārambhasamaye kriyamāṇayārambhaṇīyayeṣṭyā vyabhicāraḥ | darśārthitvenākriyamāṇatvād anyaphalaśruteś ca | tasmān maṅgalasya vighnadhvaṃsadvārā samāptiṃ prayaṅgatvād granthārambhe 'vaśyakāryatvam | paramārthatas tu maṅgalaṃ samāptau na hetuḥ, anvayavyatirekavyabhicārāt | kin tu vighnadhvaṃso maṅgalasya phalaṃ prāyaścittavat | prāripsite vighno mā bhūd iti kāmanayā maṅgalasyācaraṇād vighnābhāvasyābhilaṣaṇīyatvāc ca | samāptiś ca svakāraṇād eva bhavati | yathā kārīryā vṛṣṭikāmo yajeteti kārīrīsakāśān nidāghanivṛttimātraṃ vṛṣṭiḥ svakāraṇād eva | yatra maṅgalaṃ vināpi samāptir bhavati tatra janmāntarād anuvartamānavighnātyantābhāva eva hetuḥ | yatra tu maṅgale saty api samāptir na dṛśyate tatra vighnadhvaṃsaḥ pratyekaṃ phalaṃ bhavaty eva | sāṅgād vaidikāt karmaṇaḥ phalāvaśyambhāvaniyamāt | yatra samāptir na dṛśyate tatra vighnāntaraṃ maṅgalānantarotpannavighno lokāvagatakāraṇābhāvo vā hetutām upayātīty alam ativistareṇa ||

nanu vināyakādidevatāṃ vihāya kimarthaṃ śivasya namaskāro vihitaḥ | ucyate, śabdaśāstraṃ praṇinīṣor asya granthakṛto jñānasyaivākāṅkṣaṇīyatayā tatpradāyakasyeśvarasyaiva namaskāro nyāyyaḥ | tad uktam |
īśvarāj jñānam anvicched gatim icchej janārdanāt |
ārogyaṃ bhāskarād icched dhanam icched dhutāśanād
iti |

nanu mānasavācikakāyikabhedāt trividhasya namaskārasya sambhave 'pi vācika eva namaskāraḥ kathaṃ vihitaḥ | ucyate, vācikamātraprastāvāt tādṛśa eva namaskāraḥ kartum ucitaḥ | na tv aparaḥ | yad vā, vācikanamaskāra hetubhūtaḥ prathamo mānaso 'pi namaskāra ākṣepyaḥ | kecit tu kāyamanovyāpārajanmanamaskārayor asattvapratipādakapramāṇavirahāt tāv api tena vihitāv ity ācakṣate ||
atha parameśvaraṃ praṇamya sajjanādīn namasyati ||
div.l:
diśi diśy amṛtadravaṃ sravantyaḫ
prathayantyaẖ kṛtināṃ dṛśaḫ prasādam |
viśadāḫ prasaranti yasya gāvas
sa mahātmā jayati dvijādhirājaḥ ||
div.p: diśi diśi kāṣṭhāyāṃ kāṣṭhāyām amṛtadrava ivāmṛtadravas taṃ santoṣaṃ vā pīyūṣapravāhaṃ ca sravantyaḥ samutpādayantyaḥ, kṛtināṃ puṇyavatāṃ dṛśo jñānasya dṛṣṭeś ca prasādam utkarṣaṃ prasannatāṃ ca prathayantyo vistārayantyaḥ, viśadā vyākaraṇādidoṣarahitā nirmalāś ca yasya gāvo vāco raśmayaś ca prasaranti samullasanti | sa mahātmā vipulabuddhis tejassvarūpaś ca dvijādhirājaḥ sajjano nakṣattrādhipaś candraś ca jayati | sarvotkarṣavān bhavati | jayatir atrākarmakaḥ | sarvotkarṣe vartate, anekārthatvād dhātūnām | yatra sarvotkṛṣṭatvaṃ, tatra namaskāryatvam iti nāntarīyakatayā namaskārasyākṣepān namasyo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |

jayatu dvijādhirāja iti pāṭho 'sādhuḥ | jayateḥ pañcamīparasmaipadaprathamapuruṣaikavacanaṃ na bhavati, tatrabhavatāṃ vṛddhānām anuśāsanāt | dvijānām adhirājo dvijādhirāja iti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣaḥ | na nirdhāraṇa iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapratiṣedho na bhavati | yataḥ | yatra trayaḥ samudāya nirdhāryamāṇanirdhāraṇakāraṇāni sambhavanti tad eva nirdhāraṇam | asya tu na tathāvidhatvam, nirdhāraṇahetor anupādānāt |
yad vā, adhiko rājā adhirājaḥ | dvijaś cāsāv adhirājaḥ dvijādhirāja iti viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ | viśeṣeṇaviśeṣyabhāvaṃ prati kāmacārāt pūrvo nipāto na bhavati | samāsāntagatānām ity akāraḥ pratyayaḥ |

yad vā, yasya diśi diśi sarvatra kṛtinām_ ṛtadravaṃ satyajñānasvarūpam_ aṃ vāsudevaṃ paraṃ brahma sravantyo bodhayantyaḥ | tathātmadarśanam amṛtatvasādhanam ity evaṃrūpaṃ kṛtaṃ vidyate yeṣāṃ te kṛtinaḥ | teṣām abhyāsavatāṃ dṛśa īkṣakasya pratyagātmana avidyādipratibimbitasya brahmaṇa eva sato jīvasya prasādam avidyādipratibimbitatvābhāvarūpaṃ nairmalyaṃ brahmasvarūpatvaṃ prathayantyaḥ pratipādayantyaḥ | tathā viśadā anādisiddhatvena doṣavigamān nirmalāḥ | tathā dvijādhirājaḥ dvijeṣu brāhmaṇakṣattriyavaiśyeṣv adhikṛtā gāvo vācaḥ | satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma | tat tvam asītyādayaḥ śrutayaḥ | prasanti samullasanti | sa mahātmā mahas tejaḥ ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tathā svaprakāśo jayati | akāro bhagavān viṣṇuḥ |

yad vā, am_ iti syāt paraṃ brahma | ṛtaśabdaḥ satyavācakaḥ |
ṛtam uñchaśile toye dīpte satye 'bhipūjite
iti | dravaśabdo jñānārthaḥ | sarve gatyarthā jñānārthā iti vacanāt | evam anyatrāpi |
dṛg darśane locane ca dṛg buddhāv īkṣake 'pi ca |
dvijān adhikṛtya dvijādhi | avyavībhāvaḥ | dvijādhi rājante iti dvijādhirājaḥ | kartari kvip | brāhmaṇakṣattriyaviśām eva vede 'dhikāra uktaḥ | na tu śūdrasya | tad uktam | brahmakṣattraviśo dvijāḥ |
yad vā, amṛtadravam amṛtatvena brahmatvena dravaṃ jñānaṃ sravantya iti |

yad vā, diśi diśi sthāne sthāne dṛśas tattvajñānād amṛtadravam apunarutpattiṃ mokṣaṃ sravantyo bodhayantyaḥ | tathā kṛtināṃ prāṇināṃ prasādaṃ prakarṣeṇa sādaṃ māraṇaṃ prathayantyo viśadāḥ prayogahetubhūtayathārthavākyārthajñānajanyatvān nirmalā yasya gāvo vacaḥ |
tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti
nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya,
vāyavyaṃ śvetam ajam ālabheta, aśvamedhena yajetetyādayaḥ prasaranti prasphuranti | sa dvijādhirājaś candramauliḥ | mahātmā paramātmā jayati | mṛtānāṃ prāṇināṃ dravo 'nyatra gamanaṃ punar utpattiḥ | na mṛtadravo 'mṛtadravo 'punarutpattiḥ punarjanmābhāvo mokṣaḥ | dṛśa iti pañcamī | kṛñ hiṃsāyām ity asmād bhāve ktapratyaye kṛtam iti sidhyati | tata in | dvijādhirājo vidyate yasyeti arśaāditvād ac |

yad vā, yasya yasmān nārāyaṇāt prasādaṃ prasannam amṛtadravaṃ jalapravāhaṃ prathayantyo diśi diśi sravantyo nadyaḥ prasaranti tathā dṛśo jñānāni kṛtināṃ yogināṃ prasaranti tathā gāvo vācaḥ bhagavadgītādīni śāstrāṇi nirmalāḥ prasaranti | sa mahātmā mahādhṛtiḥ dvijādhirājo garuḍavāhano jayati |
amṛtaṃ yajñaśeṣe syāt pīyūṣe salile ghṛte |
ayācite ca mokṣe ca dhanvantarisuparvaṇoḥ |
syād amṛto 'mṛtāpathyāguḍūcyāmalakīṣu ca |
sravantī nimnagāpageti kośaḥ | prasādas tu prasannateti kośaḥ | ārśaāditvād ac | yad vā, karmaṇi ghañ | dṛśa iti prathamābahuvacanam | dvije adhirāja iti saptamītatpuruṣaḥ | yasyety apavādaviṣaye kvacid utsargasyāpi samāveśa iti pañcamyarthe ṣaṣṭhī | yathā |
niśāmaya tadutpattiṃ vistārād gadato mama |
ātmadehamanobrahmasvabhāvadhṛtibuddhiṣu ||

yad vā, yasya gāvo netrāṇi somasūryahutāśā amṛtadravaṃ pīyūṣadravaṃ saliladravaṃ ca sravantyaḥ, tathā kṛtināṃ puṇyavatāṃ dṛśaḥ prasādaṃ dṛṣṭer anugrahaṃ prathayantyaḥ | tathā viśadāḥ | viṣaṃ garalaṃ jalaṃ ca dyati nivārayantīti viṣadāḥ prasaranti | sa mahātmā mahā brahmahā ātmā deho yasya sa brahmadveṣī dvijarājaḥ anantasarpadhārako jayati | sūryahutāśau jalaṃ sravataḥ |
agnau prastāhutiḥ samyag ādityam upatiṣṭhate |
ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajā
iti vacanāt | candro mṛtasrāvakatvād viṣaghnaḥ | viśadā ity asya viṣaśabdavācyagaralanāśakartṛparatve 'pi na doṣaḥ | yamakaśleṣacittreṣu tālavyamūrdhanyayoḥ śakāraṣakārayor abheda iti vacanāt |
viṣaṃ tu garale toye viṣāyāṃ tu viśā bhavet |
maṃ brahmāṇaṃ hantīti mahā | mahā ātmā deho yasyeti mahātmā | kvip brahmabhrūṇavṛttreṣv iti kvip | tad uktaṃ |
tavaiśvaryaṃ yatnād yad upari viriñco harir adha ityādi |
dvijarājaḥ śaśadhare sauparṇe nantabhogini |
pṛṣaṅke pānīye diśi dṛśi surendrapraharaṇe |
paśau raśmau svarge bhuvi vacasi gauḥ strīpuruṣayoḥ |

yad vā, yasya dvijādhirājaḥ mayūravāhanasya etadvyākaraṇarūpā vācaḥ amṛtadravaṃ śabdabrahmajñānaṃ prathayantyas tathā kṛtināṃ svalpābhyāsavatāṃ dṛśaḥ prasādaṃ buddheḥ prasannatāṃ sravantyo vistārayantyaḥ prasaranti | sa mahātmā tejaso 'gneḥ ātmā deho yasya sa kumāro jayati | mahaśabdasyākārāntasyāpi tejovācakatve na doṣaḥ | maha uddhavatejasor iti dvyakṣarahakārānteṣu pāṭhāt | senānīr agnibhūr guha iti kośaḥ | dvijādhirāja iti ṣaṣṭhī | dvije adhi dvijādhi | dvijādhi rājate iti dvijādhirāṭ | kvip | yad vā, prathamā | ac pacādibhyaś cety ac | atra bhagavataḥ kumārasya namaskāra ucitaḥ | yata etatprasādāsāditamahimnā śarvavarmaṇaitad vyākaraṇaṃ viracitam |

śleṣādayo 'laṅkārāḥ | jayaty arthenārthāntarasaṅkramitena granthakartuḥ | sajjanādīn uddiśya namaskāralakṣaṇaṃ vastv abhivyajyate iti vastudhvaniḥ | sajjanādeḥ prabhāvakhyāpanena taṃ prati ratyākhyo bhavo 'bhivyajyate iti bhavadhvaniś ca ||
athātmana auddhatyaṃ pariharati |
div.l:
svasutasya śiśor yaśodharasya
smaraṇārthaṃ vihito mayā śramo 'yam |
upayogam iyād yadi prasaṅgād
aparatrāpi tato bhaved avandhyaḥ ||
div.p: svasutasya svo 'bhinno yaḥ sutaḥ, tasyaurasyasya putrasya śiśoḥ samīcīnasādhuśabdānabhijñasya yaśodharasya yaśodharanāmnaḥ smaraṇārthaṃ samyak sādhuśabdavyutpattyarthaṃ mayā paṇḍitajagaddhareṇāyaṃ śramo bālabodhinīrūpaḥ prayatno vihito viracitaḥ | prasaṅgād anyagranthānām asannidheḥ | aparatrāpi yaśodharād anyatrāpi upayogam upādānam | yadi yasmin kāle yasmād vā kāraṇād iyāt prāpnuyāt, tadā tasmin kāle tasmād vā karaṇād avandhyo bhavet saphalatām āsādayet | sambhāvanāyāṃ saptamī | svaśabdena svasmād asyābhinnatā bodhyate | tena snehabāhulyād yaśodharam uddiśyāyaṃ granthaḥ kṛtaḥ |

yad vā prasaṅgād iti lyablope pañcamī | prasaṅgaṃ prāpyety arthaḥ | śiśur vyākaraṇādāv apravīṇo na tu stanandhayaḥ | vihita iti bhāve ktaḥ | na tv atīte virodhāt | vihitaṃ vidhānaṃ tad vidyate yasyeti vihitaḥ | arśaāditvād acpratyayaḥ |
yad vā vidhīyate iti kṛtyayuṭo nyatrāpi ceti vartamāne ktaḥ |

yad vā vipūrvād dhāñaḥ karaṇe vartamānād ādikarmaṇi ktaḥ | nanv ādikarmadyotakānāṃ praśabdādīnām abhāve katham atrādikarmatvāvagatiḥ | ucyate, prādikaṃ vināpy ādikarmāvagamyate | tathā ca prayogaḥ |
idaṃ tattvātattvavyatikarakarāle ndhatamase
jaganmāyākārair iva hataparair hā vinihitaṃ |
tad uddhartuṃ śakto niyatam avisaṃvādivacanaḥ
tvam evātas trātas tvayi kṛtasaparyāḥ kṛtadhiya
iti | kṛtā kartuṃ prārabdhāsaparyāyais te kṛtasaparyā iti taṭṭīkākārair vyākhyātam | evaṃ vanāyapītapratibaddhavatsām ityādāv api jñeyam ||
atha prāmāṇiko loko viditasambandhābhidheyaprayojana eva pravartate | na vyasanādhīnatayeti pravṛttyaṅgabhūtaṃ sambandhādikaṃ granthādāv avaśyaṃ vaktavyam ity ata āha |
div.l:
iha yuktyanugānavadyahṛdyakramadṛbdhāẖ kṛtināṃ harantu vācaḥ |
matijāḍyalavaṃ lavaṅgajātīphalapotāsavilāsam āsajantyaḥ ||
div.p:
iha kātantre | yuktyanugānavadyahṛdyakramadṛbdhāḥ, yuktyanugā nyāyānusāriṇyaḥ anavadyāḥ nirdoṣāḥ hṛdyakrameṇa sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādakāriṇyā paripāṭyā dṛbdhā umbhitā lavaṅgajātīpotāsavilāsam āsajantyo devakusumapunnāgakarpūraviśeṣavibhramaṃ samutpādayantyo 'rthān mama vāca etadvṛttirūpāḥ | kṛtināṃ svalpābhyāsavatāṃ matijāḍyalavaṃ mateḥ buddheḥ yaj jāḍyam ayathārthavastuviṣayatvaṃ, tasya lavo vilāsaḥ taṃ harantu nivārayantu | yathā lavaṅgādibhir jāḍyaṃ nivāryate, tathānayā vṛttyā yuktādiviśiṣṭayānyavṛttibhya utkṛṣṭayā svalpena kālena sādhuśabdavyutpattyabhāvarūpaṃ jāḍyam apasaryate ity arthaḥ |
lavo leśe vilāse ca cchedane rāmanandane |
yad vā leśaśabdopādānam auddhatyaparīhārārtham |

kṛtinām iti saṃsaṅge in | vṛttyanuprāsādayo 'laṅkārāḥ | kātantram abhidhānam | abhidheyam sādhuśabdāḥ | tayor abhidhānābhidheyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ | prayojanaṃ sādhuśabdavyutpattiḥ | prayojanaprayojanam adṛṣṭādi |

nanv etat sarvam asya prāmāṇye sati saṅgacchate | tad eva kutaḥ | ucyate, śrutir etatprāmāṇyabodhikā samasti | tathā hi, ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyag jñātaḥ sa prayuktaḥ svarge loke kāmadhug bhavati iti | tathā cātharvaṇikā āmananti | dve vidye veditavye iti tasmād brahmavido vadanti | parā caivāparā ca | tatrāparā, ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmavedo 'tharvavedaḥ śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ chando jyotiṣam iti | tatra varṇajanmabodhikā śikṣā | yajñakarmaṇām upadeśaḥ kalpaḥ | sādhuśabdānām anvākhyānaṃ vyākaraṇam | anvarthasya prakāśakaṃ niruktam | cittravṛttalakṣaṇaś chandaḥ | atīndriyaśubhāśubhādikarmaṇāṃ prakāśakaṃ jyotiṣam | prābhākarās tv aśvam ālabhetety atrākāravakārayor madhyasthitasya varṇasya dantyatve asvasyāvidyamānaṃ svaṃ dhanaṃ yasyeti daridrasyālambhanaṃ syāt | tālavyatve tu turaṅgamasyeti saṃśayād aprāmāṇyaprasaktau vyākaraṇānusāreṇa aśūvyāptāv ity asmād dhātor auṇādike pratyaye tālavyatvasya niścayād aśvālambanaśāstram eva vyākaraṇasya prāmāṇyam āvedayatīty ācakṣate | yad vā, aśnute dhvānam ity aśvaḥ | aśū pruṣilaṭikanikhaṭiviśibhyaḥ kvann iti kvanpratyayaḥ |

nanu ko 'yaṃ śabdo yasya vyākaraṇena sādhutvam asādhutvaṃ vā pratipādyate | ucyate, yenoccāritenārthaḥ pratīyate sa śabdaḥ | tad uktaṃ kātyāyanena guruṇā bhagavatāpavarṣeṇa | gakāraukāravisarjanīyāḥ śabda iti | uccāriteṣu hi gakārādiṣu dhenusvargāder arthasya pratītiḥ samupajāyate | etad anye na manyante | tathā hi, kim amī varṇāḥ krameṇārthaṃ bodhayanti, yaugapadyena vā | nādyaḥ, ādyavarṇād evārthāvagatāv anyavarṇānarthakyaprasaṅgāt | na dvitīyaḥ, uccāritapradhvaṃsitvād varṇānāṃ yaugapadyānupapatteḥ | vidyamānair evāvayavaiḥ samudāyaḥ samārabhyate | atha mīmāṃsakanaye, vināśābhāvād varṇānāṃ samudāyaḥ samastīti cen na, uccāraṇānantaraṃ vāyubhis tirodhānāṅgīkārāt | atha pūrvavarṇotpādito 'tiśayo 'ntyavarṇena saṅgato 'rtham avagamayati | atiśayaś ca pūrvavarṇasmṛtijanito 'ntyavarṇaviṣayānubandhī pratyaya iti cen maivam | ekasmṛtyuparūḍhānāṃ varṇānām arthāvabodhakatve sati kramasmaraṇe nimittaṃ nāstīty utkrameṇa smaraṇaṃ mantavyam | tena saro rasa ity aviśeṣapratyayena bhavitavyam iti tasmād varṇasamūhair abhivyaṅgyaḥ sphoṭalakṣaṇo 'rthātmā śabdo mantavyaḥ | na tu varṇāḥ śabdāḥ | sphuṭanti vikasanty arthā asmād iti sphoṭaḥ | sa ca nityo niravayava eko niṣkramakaḥ | pramāṇaṃ cātra, śabdād uccāritāt sarvathārthapratītyanyathānupapattiḥ | yady evaṃ kathaṃ śabdakāry ayaṃ māṇavako dhvaniṃ kurvann ucyate iti satyam | abhivyaṅgyābhivyañjakayor abhedopacārād bhaviṣyati | ye tu, aḥ viṣṇuḥ, uḥ brahmā, ityādayas te sphoṭākhyaśabdābhivyaktikāraṇāny ekavarṇā ekadhvanayaḥ sphoṭaśabdavācyāḥ | yad vā, ekasminn eva varṇe samūha āropyate |

sādhutvaṃ ca vyākaraṇavyutpādyatvam | tena ye śabdā vyākaraṇena vyutpādyante, te sādhavaḥ, netare | vyākaraṇasya ca phalam āgamajñānam | tasya ca dharmārthakāmamokṣajñānam | tadanuṣṭhātuś caturvargalakṣaṇaṃ phalam | tena vyākaraṇe sarvathādaro vidheyaḥ | uktaṃ ca |
āpaḥ pavittraṃ paramaṃ pṛthivyām apāṃ pavittraṃ paramaṃ hi mantrāḥ |
teṣāṃ hi sāmargyajuṣāṃ pavittraṃ maharṣayo vyākaraṇaṃ nirāhuḥ ||
rūpāntareṇa devās te vicaranti mahītale
ye vyākaraṇasaṃskārapavittritamukhā narā
iti |

iha kila kaścit sarvamaṅgalāliṅgito gaṅgādhara iva, bhīmakirīṭirājamukuṭaluṭhanmaṇikoṭisaṃghṛṣṭapādapīṭho yudhiṣṭhira iva, viracitānekavāhinīsaṃrambho 'mbhonidhir iva, vividhavibudhamaṇḍalīmaṇḍita ākhaṇḍala iva, samāsāditāhīnabhogasaṃsargo garuḍavāhana iva, śrīsātavāhano nāma rājā babhūva | sa sabhāsaṅgata ekadā kenacid vaideśikena kutaścit kāraṇād rājan bhavān mūrkhaḥ kathaṃ rājyaṃ vidhatte, yo vijñaptim api na budhyate, ity atīva nirbhartsito lalajje | tataḥ sa dvitīyadivase sarvān sacivān rājanītikuśalān sarvaśāstravinirṇayanipuṇān paṇḍitāṃś cāhūya, yūyaṃ mama ṣaṇmāsābhyantare śābdīṃ vyutpattiṃ vidadhadhvam | yad yuṣmabhyaṃ rocate, tan mat prārthayadhvam iti vijñaptiṃ cakāra | tatra sarveṣu paṇḍiteṣu tūṣṇīmbhūṣṇuṣu satsu niyatter akasmān nikhilaśāstravettā śrīśarvavarmācāryo bhavatsamīhitaṃ karavai iti pratijñāṃ vidadhe | sa ca santuṣṭena nareśvareṇācintyamahimnā pramattamātaṅgatuṅgaturaṅgagāṅgeyādidānaiḥ santoṣitaḥ svasadanam upasasāra | sa sārvais sarvaiḥ sambandhibhir ayam alpamedhāḥ katham evaṃ pratijñātavān ity upahasita etat setsyati na veti cintayā gṛhaparisaraparivartinaṃ bhagavantaṃ kumāram upavāsais toṣayāmāsa | santuṣṭaś ca kumāraḥ svātmapradarśanapurassaraṃ prasiddhavarṇasamāmnāyagrahaṇe 'sya śarvavarmaṇaḥ pratijñāsiddhir nānyatheti sādhitakramavarṇasamāmnāyānādareṇa siddhakramavarṇasamāmnāyaparibhāṣaṇaprayojanakam idaṃ sūttraṃ praṇināya ||
div.l: oṁ siddho varṇasamāmnāyaḥ ||
div.note: varṇayanti kathayanti tāṃs tān arthaviśeṣān iti varṇāḥ
sūcanāt sūtraṃ sūcayati tān tān arthaviśeṣān iti sūtram
div.p: asti siddhakramo varṇānām akārādīnāṃ samāmnāyaḥ pāṭho mātṛkārūpaḥ | asti ca pāṇininā sve tantre pratyāhārārtham aparathā sādhitakramaḥ | tatrāniyame prāpte niyamaḥ kriyate | iha tantre siddhakrama eva varṇapāṭho vakṣyamāṇasvarādisaṃjñānām āśrayatvena grāhyo na sādhitakrama iti seyam aniyame niyamaḥ paribhāṣā | akṣarāṇāṃ varṇasaṃjñāpy ata eva varṇaśabdoccāraṇād boddhavyā | a ā i ī u ū ṛ ṝ ḷ ḹ e ai o au svarāḥ | ka kha ga gha ṅa ca cha ja jha ña ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa ta tha da dha na pa pha ba bha ma ya ra la va śa ṣa sa ha aṃ aḥ ẖka ḫpa vyañjanāni | prayojanaṃ sarvatra ||
div.note: tantryante vyutpādyante nena śabdā iti tantraṃ vyākaraṇam | pratyāhriyante saṅkṣipyante 'smin varṇā pratyāhāraḥ | tadarthaṃ pratyāhārārtham
nanu samāmnāyo varṇānām eva yujyate tatkiṃ varṇaśabdoccāraṇenetyāhākṣarāṇām iti | na kevalamidaṃ paribhāṣāsūtram api tu saṃjñāsūtram apīty arthaḥ ||
svaryante śabdyante vyañjanāny ebhir iti svarāḥ
div.p: ṣidhu saṃrāddhau | sidhyati sma gatyarthākarmaketyādinā siddhyater akarmakāt kartari ktaḥ | rādhirudhīty anena veṭtvān na ḍīṅśvīdanubandhety anena ceḍabhāve prāpte paratvād veṇnibandhana eveḍabhāvo nyāyyaḥ | yad vā ṣidhū śāstre maṅgalye cetyasya rūpam idam | kecit ṣidha gatyām ity asyedaṃ rūpaṃ, maṅgalārthādau vṛttir anekārthatvāt | dhātor arthāntare vṛtter ity akarmakatvam ity āhuḥ | ghaḍhadhabhebhya iti dhatve kṛte dhuṭāṃ tṛtīyaś caturtha iti dhasya daḥ | varṇa varṇane curāditvād in | varṇayanti kathayanti tāṃs tān arthaviśeṣān iti pacāditvād ac | ino lopaḥ | yad vā vṛṅ_ āvaraṇe | vriyante prayatnodīritena kaṇṭhādyabhihitena vāyunā niṣpādyante iti | vṛṇvanti rundhanti kaṇṭhādikaṃ vyāpnuvantīti vā | kṝprūvṛnidhāñbhyo na iti napratyayaḥ | mnā abhyāse samāṅpūrvaḥ samāmnānam iti mnāteḥ svarāntatvāt svaravṛdṛgamīty ali prāpte tadapavādabhūtaḥ iṅābhyāṃ ceti bhave ghañ | yad vā, 'nenaiva samyag āmnāyante 'smin varṇā ity adhikaraṇe ghañ | āyir ādeśaḥ | saṃśabdena ca samyaggrastanirastāmbūkṛtādivarṇadoṣarāhityaṃ dyotyate | varṇānāṃ samāmnāyo varṇasamāmnāya iti bhedanibandhanayā ṣaṣṭhyā samāsaḥ |

yady api varṇebhyaḥ samāmnāyasya pāramārthiko bhedo nasti, tathāpi likhyamānapaṭhyamānādyavasthābhedanibandhano bhedo 'ṅgīkāryaḥ | sa ca ṣaṣṭhīsamāso bahuvacanāntena varṇaśabdenocitaḥ | na tv ekavacanāntena, kramapāṭharūpasya samāmnāyasya bahuṣv eva sambhavāt | yady evaṃ dvivacanabahuvacanāntānāṃ samāso na bhavatīty asya vacanasya kā gatiḥ | ucyate, yatra vibhakter lope samāsāt tadartho nāvasīyate, tatra dvivacanabahuvacanāntānāṃ samāso na bhavati | yathā rājapuruṣa ity atra rājñoḥ rājñāṃ vā puruṣa iti | yatra tu samāsāt tadarthāvagatau pramāṇaṃ samasti, tatra samāsa āvaśyakaḥ | yathā yuṣmatputra ity atra | atra tu samāse saṅkhyāviśeṣapratītau samāmnāyaśabdasya pramāṇasyodaya iti bhavaty eva bahuvacanāntena varṇaśabdena samāsaḥ | etad eva vakṣyati, varṇānām akārādīnām iti |

nanu sarvatra vākyaṃ kriyayā parisamāptim eti | tataś ca tadartho vagamyate | na cātra kriyā kācid upalabhyate | tat katham atra vākyārthāvagatir iti cet satyam | yatrānyat kriyāpadaṃ na śrūyate, tatrāstir bhavantīparaḥ prayoktavya ity astīty asyādhyāhārād vākyārtho vasīyate ity ata āha, astīti |

yady api siddhaśabdasya siddham ākāśaṃ siddham odanaṃ kaśmīreṣu siddha iti nityaniṣpannaprasiddhārthakatvam asti, tathāpīha nityaniṣpannārthayor anupayogāt prasiddhārthatvam ucitam | prasiddhiś ca yasya kasyacit kenacid dharmeṇa bhavati | asya tu varṇasamāmnāyasya pāṇiniviracitākṣarasamāmnāyavilakṣaṇānupūrvīkatveneṣyata ity āha, siddhakrama iti | lokaprasiddhānupūrvīka ity arthaḥ | yad vā, kramo vṛddhaparamparā | tatra siddhaḥ siddhakramaḥ | rājadantādiṣu param iti viśeṣeṇasyāpi kramaśabdasya paranipātaḥ | atra pakṣe pāṭha ity atra krameṇety adhyāhāryam | varṇaśabdo nekārtho pi śabdaśāstraprastāvād akārādīn varṇān vakti na brāhmaṇādīn ity āha, varṇānām akārādīnām iti | varṇaśabdena varṇasambandhī lakṣyate | anyathā tasya kathaṃ pratītiḥ syāt | pāṭha iti pāṭhamātram ity arthaḥ | mātṛkārūpa iti | mūlākṣarāprabandho mātṛkā | tadrūpa ity arthaḥ |

atha siddhaśabdasya pratyāyyavyāvṛttyādhikaraṇatāvacchedakatvam iti tadvyavacchedyaṃ tātparyeṇa pradarśayituṃ bhūmikāṃ racayati, asti ceti | caśabdaḥ sādhitakramavarṇasamāmnāyaṃ samuccinoti | tena varṇānāṃ samāmnāyo parathā cāstīti sambandhaḥ | aparathety asya vyākhyānaṃ pāṇininā sve tantre pratyāhārārthaṃ sādhitakrama iti | yad vaitat kaumāravyākaraṇātiriktavyākaraṇāpekṣayā pāṇiniviracitasya kramasyānyaprakārasādhitatvam astīty ata āha, aparatheti |

pāṇininā sve tantra iti | paṇinor apatyaṃ pāṇinaḥ | pāṇinasya praśasyam apatyaṃ pāṇiniḥ | iṇṇ ata itīṇ | vyākaraṇaviśeṣakārakaḥ | tantryate vyutpādyante nena śabdā iti tantraṃ vyākaraṇam | anekārthatvāt tu trikuṭumbadhāraṇe ity asya vyutpādane pi vṛttiḥ | pratyāhārārtham iti | pratyāhriyante saṅkṣipyante smin varṇā iti pratyāhāraḥ | viśiṣṭānupūrvīkaḥ | viśiṣṭānubandhavāṃś cākṣarasamāmnāyaḥ | aïuṇṇ ityādikaḥ śaṣasar_ hal ityantaḥ | tasmai ity arthaḥ |

yady evaṃ tad atra kiṃ syād ity ata āha, tatrāniyama iti | siddhasādhitakramayor varṇasamāmnāyayoḥ satoḥ katarasyātra grahaṇam iti siddhakramavarṇasamāmnāyaparigrahaniyāmakam idaṃ sūtram ity arthaḥ | etad evāha, iha tantre ityādi, kātantra ity arthaḥ |

vakṣyamāṇasvarādisaṃjñānām iti | siddhakramavarṇasamāmnāyāparigrahe svarādisaṃjñānāṃ nirādhāratvaṃ prasajyetety arthaḥ | nyāyaprāptam artham āha, na sādhitakrama iti | yathā dakṣiṇena cakṣuṣā paśyatīty ukte rthād vāmena na paśyatīty artho vagamyate, tathā siddhakramavarṇasamāmnāyo grāhya ity ukte 'rthān na sādhitakramo gṛhyate ity artho vagamyate ity arthaḥ | etena niṣedhasūtram apīdam iti darśitam | yad vā, siddhakrama evety atraivakārasya vyāvṛttyam āha, na sādhitakrama iti | itiśabdo niyamasvarūpavyavacchedakaḥ |

yad vā hetau tena iti hetoḥ seyam aniyame niyamaḥ paribhāṣeti sambandhaḥ kāryaḥ | seyam iti sūtrasambandhāt tad idam iti vaktavye seyam iti yad uktaṃ, tat prakramyamāṇasya strīliṅgasya paribhāṣāśabdasya sambandhād yujyate | tathā ca dṛśyate bhagavato mahābhāṣyakārasya prayogaḥ |
kiṃ yat tadbhinneṣv abhinnaṃ cchinneṣv achinnaṃ sāmānyabhūtaṃ sa śabda
iti | paribhāṣyate nayā kāryam iti paribhāṣā | pāṇinīyasya sādhitakramasya varṇasamāmnāyasya vṛddhopāttatayā jhagity eva buddhau pratibhāsamānatvenāntaraṅgatayā grahaṇayogyatve pi siddhasyāpi satas tasya pratijñāsiddhyabhāvahetukatayā nirastatvāt siddhakramavarṇasamāmnāyaparibhāṣaṇaprayojanam idaṃ paribhāṣāsūtram ity arthaḥ | evaṃ ca siddhaśabdasya varṇasamāmnāyaviśeṣakatvād viśeṣaṇatvaṃ | tena maṅgalam apy anenopaśrutyā pratyāyyate | vācyas tv asyārthaḥ prasiddha iti bhāvaḥ |

yad vā, agniṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetety atrājñātajñāpano vidhiḥ | dadhnā juhotīty atra cānūdyamāno nuvādarūpeṇa jñātajñāpano vidhir iti pūrvācāryaprasiddhasaṃjñānvākhyānena siddhasya varṇasamāmnāyasyānūdyamānatvād vidhisūtram idam | ṭīkāyāṃ tu tridhaiva paribhāṣādhikāravidhilakṣaṇāni sūtrāṇy uktāni | saṃjñāniyamapratiṣedhānuvādātideśavikalpasamuccayā vidher eva bhedāḥ |

nanu samāmnāyaḥ pāṭhaḥ | sa ca varṇānām eva yujyate, na tv anyeṣām iti varṇaśabdānupādāne pi varṇārtho vagamyate | tat kim atra varṇaśabdopādānenety ata āha, akṣarāṇāṃ varṇasaṃjñāpīti | na kevalam idaṃ paribhāṣāsūtram api tu saṃjñāsūtram apīty api śabdārthaḥ | akṣarāṇāṃ varṇasaṃjñayā prayojanam atraiva sūtra iti bhāvaḥ | ata eva varṇaśabdoccāraṇād iti | idaṃ bhinnādhikaraṇaṃ pañcamīdvayam | yato 'tra śāstre varṇaśabdo kṣarāṇām eva vācako bhavatu na viprādīnām ata eva yad varṇaśabdoccāraṇaṃ tasmād ity arthaḥ |

vyañjanānāṃ svaratvāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati, svarā iti | kakārādīnāṃ hakārāntānām akārasahitānām eva vyañjanatvaṃ mā pramāṅkṣīd ity ata āha, vyañjanānīti | eṣām akārasācivyena pāṭhaḥ sukhoccāraṇārthaḥ | anyathārdhamātrāṇāṃ vyañjanānām uccāraṇaṃ kathaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ |

sūttraṃ punar vākyaviśeṣaḥ | tad uktam |
alpākṣaram asandigdhaṃ sāravad viśvato mukham |
astobham anavadyaṃ ca sūtraṃ sūtravido viduḥ ||
alpākṣaraṃ nirarthakākṣararahitam | asandigdhaṃ sāṃśayakapadarahitam | sāravat siddhāntarūpārthamātrasyābhidhāyakam | viśvatomukhaṃ prakaraṇānuvṛttyādibhir bahuviṣayakaṃ | astobham anadhikam arthalabhyārthapradarśakapadarahitam iti yāvat | anavadyaṃ durbodhatvaviphalatvavisandhikatvāprākaraṇikatvādidoṣarahitaṃ sūtraṃ samīcīnaṃ bhavati |

tatra sūtrasyāpi vyākhyānaṃ ṣaḍvidham asti |
upodghātaḥ padaṃ caiva padārthaḥ padavigrahaḥ |
cālanā pratyavasthā ca vyākhyā sūtrasya ṣaḍvidhā ||
vyākhyātuṃ sūtroccāraṇam upodghātaḥ | upāśv avitataṃ kṛtvā ud iti śāstrasyordhvam eva hanyate nivāryate vyākhyānaviṣayako vyāmoha ity upodghātaḥ | vibhaktyekatvadvitvabahutvānuvādapūrvakavicchedaprakāśanaṃ padaṃ | padābhiprāyaprakāśanaṃ padārthaḥ | samārambhakavākyakaraṇaṃ padavigrahaḥ | hetvanuvṛttibhyāṃ labdhapadānām ākṣepaś cālanā | cālitasya phalopanyāsaḥ pratyavastheti siddham ||
atha bhagavatkumāradarśanasamāditatattvajñānaḥ śrīśarvavarmācāryaḥ prāha |
div.l: tatra caturdaśādau svarāḥ
div.p: tatra mātṛkārūpe varṇapāṭhe ādau ye caturdaśa varṇās te svarasaṃjñā bhavanti | a ā i ī u ū ṛ ṝ ḷ ḹ e ai o au | prayojanaṃ ro re lopaṃ svaraś ca pūrvo dīrgha ityādi | vī rauti ||

dātṝjjvāśayatoṣita iti vaktavye dātḹjjvāśayatoṣita iti bālena śaktivaikalyād yad apabhāṣitaṃ, tad anyo yadānukaroti bālo dātḹjjvāśayatoṣita ity āheti tadānukaraṇe nāsti doṣa iti smaraṇāt sādhu bhavati | tatsthasya ḹkārasya svarasaṃjñārthaḥ ḹkārasya pāṭhaḥ | tenātra svarāt parasya vyañjanasya vyañjane pare dvirbhāvo vaktavya iti ḹkārāt parasya jakārasya dvirbhāvaḥ | evaṃ mātḹr ity abravīc chiśur ityādau svaratve sati ḹkārasya nāmitvān nāmiparo ram iti ḹkārāt parasya visarjanīyasya rephaḥ |
tatraśabda uttaratra saṃjñāsamāveśārthaḥ svarasamānasaṃjñe krameṇa mā bhūtām iti | savarṇādisaṃjñānāṃ tu saṃjñino nirdekṣyanta eva ||

tad_ saptamyekavacanaṃ ṅi | tasmiṃs tatra | tra saptamyā iti trapratyayaḥ | asya vibhaktisaṃjñā vijñeyā ity anena vibhaktitve tatsthā lopyā ity anenāsamāsārthe pi vākye vibhaktir lupyate | trapratyaye ca pare tyadādyatvam akāre lopam ity akāralopaḥ | tatraśabdād ekatve vihitaḥ sipratyayaḥ liṅgakāryatvād bhavati | tasādīnāṃ hi sarvanāmakārya eva vibhaktitvaṃ na tv anyatra sipratyayasya ca lopo 'vyayāś ceti vidhānasāmarthyāt | anyathā padatvaṃ na syāt | na cādhikaraṇaśaktipradhānatvāt tatraśabdād adhikaraṇārthotpannāyāḥ saptamyā eva lopo na prathamāyā iti vācyaṃ | tatraśabdasyādhikaraṇārthasya liṅgārthatvāt tadabhidhānamātre utpannāyāḥ prathamāyā eva lopasyocitatvāt | anyathā dātradāśādīnāṃ karaṇādisādhanānāṃ liṅgārthībhūtatvābhāvāt tatroktāyāḥ prathamāyā abhāve dātraṃ tiṣṭhati dāśo yātītyādayaḥ prayogāḥ asādhavaḥ syuḥ | kiṃ ca dātreṇa cchinnaṃ dāśāya dehītyādayaḥ prayogāḥ paunaruktyād asādhavaḥ syuḥ |

catvār_daśan_śabdāv auṇādikatvān na sādhyete granthagauravabhayāt | caturbhir adhikāś caturadhikā iti tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ | caturadhikāś ca te daśa ceti śākapārthivāditvān madhyapadalopī karmadhārayasamāsaḥ | caturo vā śabdasyety utvam | yad vā, paratvād vyañjanāntasya yat subhor ity anenotvam | caturdaśan_ iti sthite prathamābahuvacane jas | ṣaṣṭhī tu na bhavati, saṃjñāsaṃjñinor abhedopacārāt | ghuṭi cāsambuddhāv iti dīrghaḥ | kateś ceti jaso luk | nimittābhāve naimittikasyāpy abhāva iti dīrghābhāvaḥ | liṅgāntanakārasyeti nalopaḥ | ḍudāñ_ āṅpūrvaḥ ādīyate prathamam upalabhyate iti upasarge daḥ kir iti kiḥ | ālopo sārvadhātuka ity ākāralopaḥ | svṛ śabdopatāpayoḥ | svaryante śabdyante vyañjanāny ebhir iti svarāḥ | puṃsi saṃjñāyāṃ ghaḥ guṇaḥ |

nanu svarā ity atra laukikodāttaniṣādādisvarūpasvaraśabdārthasyānupayogāt svarasaṃjñāvidhānasamaye saṃjñināṃ caturdaśānām akārādīnām arthatvenāsiddhatvād arthaval liṅgasaṃjñāyā asambhavāt kathaṃ prathamābahuvacanaṃ | saṃjñibhir arthaiḥ svaraśabdasyārthavattvāt prathamābahuvacanam upapadyate | nanv aparatra saṃjñibhir arthair arthavattvaṃ vaktuṃ yuktaṃ | na tv atra | yataḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandho 'tra kriyate, tat katham atra prathamābahuvacanaṃ | ucyate, saṃjñāśabdānāṃ pūrvāvagatārthaparityāge 'rthāntaraparigrahe nityaśabdārthasambandhasyānityatvāpattyāpasiddhānta āpadyate | tannirāsāya sarvārthabodhakatvasvarūpaśaktimattvaṃ śabdasyāṅgīkāryam | evaṃ ca tādṛśena śabdena niyatārthānabhidhāyakatvād dhānopādānādirūpo vyavahāraḥ kartuṃ na śakyata iti tatsiddhyarthaṃ puṃsāṃ śaktimātraṃ niyamyate | na tv apūrvaḥ kaścana sambandho vidhīyate | tenātra svaraśabdaś caturdaśavarṇānām eva pratyāyakaḥ | evam ācāryasyodāttādyarthāntarāparigrahamātraṃ saṃjñākaraṇam | tad uktam | sarvārthābhidhānayogyasya śaktiniyamamātraṃ saṃjñākaraṇam iti | tataḥ svaraśabdasya caturdaśavarṇasvarūpārthenārthavattvāt prathamābahuvacanaṃ saṅgacchate | yad vā, sarvatra śabdasya svarūpam evārtho 'ntaraṅgatvāt | svarūpādhyāsāc cārthāntare pratītiḥ | anyathā svarganākatridivatridaśālayā ityādau samānārthatayā dvandvo na syāt | bhinnārthānāṃ hi dvandva uktaḥ | yathā, dhavakhadirau cchindhītyādau | tasmāt svaraśabdasya svarūpam evārthaḥ | tenārthenārthavattvāt svarā iti bahuvacanam upapannaṃ |

mātṛkārūpe varṇapāṭhe iti viṣaye ity arthaḥ | a ā i ī ityādi | eteṣu svaratvajātivyāpyā atvādijātir vartate | parāparabhāvena jātidvayasya vyavasthānāt | prayojanam iti | svarasaṃjñayeti śeṣaḥ | yasya yad uddiśya pravṛttis tat tasya prayojanam | vī rautīti | ruśabde vartamānā ti | anvi adāder luk | ukārasya vṛddhir vyañjanādāv ity aukāraḥ | ghoṣavat svarapara iti ratve kṛte ro re lopam ityādinā rephalopadīrghau |

nanv akārādīnāṃ bāhulyena svarasaṃjñayā prayojanaṃ dṛśyate iti ḹkārasya svaratve kiṃ prayojanam ity ata āha, dātṝjjvāśayatoṣita iti | dātur dānakriyākartur ya ṛjur akuṭila āśayaḥ abhiprāyaḥ, tena toṣitas tuṣṭiviṣayatāṃ nīta ity arthaḥ | śaktivaikalyād iti | karaṇapāṭavarāhityād ity arthaḥ | apabhāṣitam iti yad iti śeṣaḥ | vyākaraṇasiddhe pade vaktum ucite nyādṛk padam uktam ity arthaḥ | tad anya iti | tad bālāpabhāṣitam anyo bālasamīpavartī kim asau bāla ity āhety apareṇa taṭasthena pṛṣṭaḥ san bālāpabhāṣitam eva kathayatīty arthaḥ | āheti svarūpavyavacchedakaḥ | anukaraṇe iti | anukaraṇe śabdasya tādrūpyeṇābhidhāne sādhutvābhāvarūpaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ nāstīty arthaḥ | sādhu bhavatīti | tad iti śeṣaḥ | yadānukaroti, tadā tad anukaraṇaṃ sādhu bhavatīti sambandhaḥ | tatsthasyety anukaraṇasthitasyety arthaḥ |

nanv anukāryasyāsādhutve tadanukaraṇasya sādhutvaṃ katham | ucyate, yady apy anukāryānukaraṇayoḥ svarūpaṃ samānaṃ vidyate, tathāpy arthabhedena śabdāntaratayānukaraṇasya sādhutvam iṣyate | anukaraṇasyānukāryam arthaḥ | anukāryasya tv aśaktijanyasyārtho 'nyaḥ kaścit | tad uktaṃ tridhā śabdo bhidyate svarūpataḥ svarato 'rthataś ca | kiṃ cānukaraṇaṃ śiṣṭaiḥ prayujyate | tato 'vasīyate 'sya sādhutvam | tasmād asādhuśabdānukaraṇaṃ sādhu bhavati | yat tu prakṛtivad anukaraṇam ity uktaṃ, tac chāstrīyāṃ prakṛtim āśritya saṅgacchate | śāstrīyā ca prakṛtiḥ sādhuśabdarūpaṃ na tv aśaktijam asādhuśabdarūpam | evaṃ yāny arthavanti padāni vākyāni ca ye cāpabhraṃśā ye cānarthakā varṇā yāś cāvyaktapadakyoktayas tadanukaraṇānāṃ sādhutvam aṅgīkāryaṃ | tathā cāvyaktasādṛśyokteḥ prayogaḥ sādhuḥ |
pipipriya sasasvayaṃ mumumukhāsavaṃ dehi me |
tatatyaja dududrutaṃ bhabhabhājanaṃ kāñcanam
iti skhalitajalpitaṃ madavaśāt kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ pragehasitahetave sahacarībhir adhyeyata iti |
nanv asādhvanukaraṇasya sādhutvakathanena kim iṣṭaṃ sidhyatīty ata āha, teneti | anukaraṇasya sādhutvavyavasthāpanenety arthaḥ | uktam artham anyatrātidiśati |

evam ityādi | atra mātḹr ity evānukāryaṃ nānyat tena mātḹr ity atra repho bhavati | yad vā yoṣidḷkāraṃ paṭhatītyādau ḷvarṇasya svaratve mukhyaṃ prayojanam iti | vargaprathamā ityādinā tṛtīyādisiddhiḥ |

nanv ānantaryād eva varṇasamāmnāyasyātrānuvartanaṃ bhaviṣyati | arthavaśāc ca saptamyā vibhaktipariṇāme viṣayatāvagamyate iti kiṃ varṇasamāmnāyaparāmarśiṇā tatragrahaṇenety ata āha, tatraśabda iti | neha varṇasamāmnāyānuvṛttaye tatragrahaṇaṃ kiṃ tarhi daśa samānā ity atra svarasamānasaṃjñayor milanaṃ yathā syād ity evam artham ity arthaḥ | etad evāha, svarasamānasaṃjña iti | anyathā kakārādīnāṃ samānasaṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ | pañcādau ghuḍ ityādau samānaḥ savarṇe ity anena dīrgho na syād iti bhāvaḥ |

yady evaṃ teṣāṃ dvau dvāv ityādāv api tatraśabdaḥ saṃjñāsamāveśārtho bhavatv iti nety āha, savarṇādisaṃjñānāṃ tv iti | yad vānantarasya varṇasamāmnāyasya viṣayatvenānuvṛttau satyāṃ daśa samānā iti sūtrārthaparyālocanayā prathamaparityāge kāraṇābhāvād ādimānām eva kramavyavasthitānāṃ daśānāṃ varṇānāṃ samānasaṃjñā sidhyatīti | prakaraṇāntaravyavadhāne pi, antyāt pūrva upadhetyādau varṇasamāmnāyasyānuvṛttyarthaṃ tatragrahaṇaṃ | tenopadhāsaṃjñādividhāne 'ntyād varṇāt pūrvo varṇa evopadhāsaṃjñaḥ | tathā ca śiṣṭa ityādau śāser idupadhāyā aṇ vyañjanayor ity anena varṇasya śakārasyopadhāsaṃjñakasyetvaṃ | na tv antimād ās_ ity asmād varṇasamudāyāt pūrvasya śmātrasya |

nanu krameṇa nāmisaṃjñāyām avarṇavarjanād daśa samānā ity atrāpi, ekārādīnīti dīrghādarśanāc cādāv ity avagamyate | tat kiṃ prayojanam ādigrahaṇam iti cet satyaṃ | sukhārtham etat | svarā iti mahaty api saṃjñā pūrvācāryaprasiddhyā vihitā | kāt prāk svarāḥ etaḥ samānā iti na kṛtaṃ vaicitryāt ||
div.l: daśa samānāḥ
div.p: tatrādāv ity eva | tatra mātṛkārūpe varṇapāṭhe ādau ye daśa varṇās te samānasaṃjñā bhavanti | a ā i ī u ū ṛ ṝ ḷ ḹ | prayojanam | samānas savarṇe dīrghībhavati paraś ca lopam ityādi | śivāptiḥ ||

śvasa prāṇane | ana ca | samananaṃ samānaḥ | bhāve ghañ | asyopadheti dīrghaḥ | yathā tailapāyikāśabdavācyaprāṇiviśeṣe tailārthasya pānārthasya cābhāve 'py avidyamānāvayavārthānugamane vuñpratyayaḥ śabdasaṃskārāyaiva bhavati tathātra samananaṃ samāna iti bhāvārthasyābhāve 'pi ghañpratyayo na duṣyati | saṃjñāśabdair hi saṅketabalād eva saṃjñino bodhyante | nāvayavārthānugamena |

tatrādāv ity eveti | anuvartate iti śeṣaḥ | etad evānuvartate nānyat tatrabādhakād ity arthaḥ | evakāra anyayogavyavacchedakaḥ | yad vā, tatrādāv ity etat sahāyam evedam api kāryaṃ vidhīyate | na tv atra kevalam ity arthaḥ | nanu pūrvasūtre tatrādāv iti padadvayasya kṛtakṛtyatayopakṣīṇaśaktikasyātrānuvṛttiḥ kathaṃ | ucyate, tatsadṛśasya śabdāntarasyārthasiddhinimittakatvenātrānuvṛttir bhaviṣyati | evaṃ sarvatra jñeyaṃ
prayojanam iti samānasaṃjñayeti śeṣaḥ | asmin pāde yatra yatra prayojanam iti bhavati | tatra tatra tatsaṃjñayeti śeṣa iti mantavyam | śivāptir iti | āpḷ vyāptau | bhāve ktiḥ | ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣaḥ || ||
div.l: teṣāṃ dvau dvāv anyonyasya savarṇau
div.p: dvāv ity asya sthāne dviś ca padam iti vacanād dūrīkṛtaprakṛtipratyayavibhāgaparikalpanaṃ dvau dvāv ity etac chabdāntaram ādiśyata iti sthānivattvād aikapadyaṃ bhavatīti dvau dvāv ity ekaṃ padaṃ yujyate | yad vā, dvau dvāv iti prakṛtipratyayavibhāgasya sphuṭaṃ pratīyamānatvād āvṛttiviracitabhedāśrayaṇāt padadvayaṃ saṅgataṃ | tatra nānābhidhāyakānām abhidheyasya kriyāguṇadravyair yugapat prayoktur vyāptum icchāyāṃ vīpsāyāṃ savarṇaguṇena jātāyāṃ dvir vacanaṃ | anyonyaśabdo 'vyutpannaḥ parasparārthavṛttiḥ | yad vā, anyonyasyeti kriyāvinimaye dvir vacanaṃ saś cāntaḥ puṃvadbhāvaś ca yathāsambhavaṃ lokopacārāt | anyasyā anyasyāḥ kriyāyā vinimayo nyonyam | anyonyaparasparetaretarāḥ kriyāsamabhihāre iti nipātitā ekavac ceṣyante | tena dvirvacanabahuvacane na bhavataḥ | napuṃsakaliṅgāc caite | tataḥ ṣaṣṭhyekavacanaṃ | yad vā syād yat tu pratirūpakam anyonyasyeti parasparārthe 'vyayapadaṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇe dvitīyā | samāno varṇaḥ savarṇa iti karmadhārayaḥ | dṛgdṛśadṛkṣeṣu samānasya sa iti yogavibhāgāt samānaśabdasya sabhāvaḥ |
teṣām iti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī | anyonyaśabdaṃ vyākaroti, akārasyākāra ityādi | evaṃ sarvatreti | ivarṇovarṇādiviṣaya ity arthaḥ | pūrvam eveti samānaḥ savarṇa ityādīty arthaḥ |

nanu sūtrārthaparyālocanayā hrasvadīrghayoḥ sāvarṇyasya siddhatvād dvayor hrasvayoḥ dīrghayor vā sāvarṇyaṃ kathaṃ sidhyatīty ata āha, samānāv ityādi | anvarthasaṃjñāvijñānād iti | anugatā arthenānvarthā | sa cāsau saṃjñātasyāvijñānaṃ prabodhaḥ, tasmāt | avādayaḥ kruṣṭādyarthe tṛtīyayeti tatpuruṣaḥ samāsaḥ | teneti sāvarṇyenety arthaḥ |

atha mamātretyādāv ekasyaiva varṇasya pratīyamānatvād bhedābhāvena sāvarṇyāsaṃbhavāt kathaṃ dīrghādikam ity āśaṅkate | nanv eka iti ekatvanimittavān ity arthaḥ | asau varṇa iti | akāra akārādir vety arthaḥ | nyāyaprāptam artham āha, naitāv iti | yad vā, evakāravyāvartyam āha, naitāv iti | etāv akārāv ākārau vā dvau dvitvasaṅkhyākau na bhavataḥ | etau savarṇau sadṛśavarṇau ca na bhavata ity arthaḥ | atra hetum āha, sati hi bhede iti | hir yasmād arthe bhidyate 'neneti bhedo vaidharmyaṃ tasmin sati dvitvaṃ sadṛśavarṇatvaṃ ca yuktam atra tu bhedābhāvāt sāvarṇyaṃ na sidhyatīty arthaḥ | ukte 'rthe vṛddhasammatim āha, yad āhur ityādi | sāmānyam iti | sāmānyaṃ na tu jātir ity arthaḥ | sadṛśatāyāḥ iti | tadbhede sati tadgatabhūyaḥ sāmānyavattāyā ity arthaḥ | upasaṃharati, tad ityādi | tasmān mamātretyādāv uktayuktyā sāvarṇyābhāve dīrghādikaṃ na syād ity arthaḥ |

uttaram āha, ucyate ityādi | udāttādivarṇadharmakṛtabhedāśrayaṇād dvitvaṃ savarṇatvaṃ ca sidhyatīty arthaḥ | akāra ity upalakṣaṇaṃ | tenākārekārādayo 'pi gṛhyante | udātta ityādi | udātto varṇadharmas tadvān | tathā, anudātto varṇadharmas tadvān | udāttānudātau varṇadharmau samāhriyete yasmin sa svaritas tadvān | arśaāditvād acpratyayaḥ | tad uktaṃ, yadā sarvāṅgānusārī prayatnas tīvro bhavati, tadā gātrāṇāṃ nigrahaḥ stabdhatā bhavati kaṇṭhavivarasya cāṇutvam, vāyos tīvragatitvāt svarasya raukṣyaṃ bhavati, tam udātta iti, yadā tu sarvāṅgānusārī mandaprayatno bhavati, tadā gātrāṇāṃ sraṃsanaṃ mārdavaṃ bhavati, kaṇṭhabilasya cābilatvaṃ, vāyor mandagatitvāt snigdhatā bhavati, tam anudātta iti, udāttānudāttasvarasannikarṣāt svarita ity ācakṣate | svarabhedād iti | udāttādisvarabhedād ity arthaḥ | dvaidha ity ekasyānekīkaraṇa ity arthaḥ | tāvad iti sampratīty arthaḥ | prakārāntareṇa bhedaṃ prakaṭayati, yatrāpy eka iti | anunāsikarūpakadharmaviśeṣasahitas tadrahitaś cety arthaḥ | uktam artham anyatrāpy atidiśati, evam ikārādiṣv iti | anena prakāreṇātra sāvarṇyaṃ mantavyam ity arthaḥ | uktaṃ bhedaṃ vṛddhasammatyā draḍhayati, tathā coktam ityādi | svarā evānavacchinnasantatayo bahuśo vidhīyamānāḥ plutasaṃjñāṃ bhajante | traya eva svarās traisvaryaṃ | na tu trisvarā eva traisvaryaṃ | saṅkhyayā saha saṃjñāyām eva karmadhārayasyoktatvāt | yad vā, saṃjñābhyupagamād asya bhaviṣyati | svārthe yaṇ | yaṇ ca prakīrtita iti prakīrtitagrahaṇāt | ānunāsikyabhedāc ceti | nāsikādvitīyasthānatvabhedād ity arthaḥ | apy akāra iti | apiśabdo bhinnakrama evākārāt paro jñeyaḥ | tena na kevalam akāro 'ṣṭādaśātmaka ākārādayo 'pīty arthaḥ | aṣṭādaśātmaka iti | aṣṭādaśa ātmano rūpāṇi yasya sa tathā | svārthe kaḥ | hrasvadīrghaplutabhedena trayo kārāḥ | te ca pratyekam udāttānudāttasvaritabhedena nava sampadyante | te ca pratyekaṃ sānunāsikaniranunāsikabhedenāṣṭādaśa sampadyante | ḷvarṇasya dīrghābhāvād dvādaśa prabhedā bhavanti | yadā tu, yadṛcchāśabde 'nukaraṇaśabde vā dīrghā bhaveyus tadā ḷvarṇasyāṣṭādaśa prabhedāḥ | sandhyakṣarāṇāṃ tu hrasvābhāvād dvādaśa prabhedāḥ | kecit tu sandhyakṣarāṇy apy aṣṭādaśaprabhedāny āhuḥ |

atha prakārāntareṇātra dvitvādisiddhaye bhedaṃ darśayati, yatra tv iti | bhedāropeṇeti | bhedo vaidharmyādis tasyāropaḥ | atasmiṃs tadbuddhis tenety arthaḥ | tadvad iti | abhede bhedāropeṇa mamātretyādāv api dvitvādi bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ | yady evaṃ, sarvatraiva sāvarṇyaṃ prasajyetety arucau pakṣāntaram āha, athaveti | yad vā, udāttādisvarakalpanā bhāṣāyāṃ nopayujyate ity ata āha, athavoccārakālādikṛta iti | sarveṣu varṇeṣūccārakālasthānaprayatnādiviracitaḥ kaścana viśeṣa āvaśyaka ity arthaḥ | tam āśrityeti | viśeṣam ity arthaḥ |

nanūccārakālādikṛtasya sūkṣmaviśeṣasyāvaśyaṃbhāvitvāt samānānāṃ sāvarṇyaṃ siddham | punar vyañjanānāṃ kena prakāreṇa sidhyatīty āśaṅkyāha, ata eveti | uccārakālādikṛtaviśeṣasyāvaśyaṃbhāvād ity arthaḥ | vyañjanānām apīti | na kevalaṃ samānānām ity api śabdārthaḥ | evaṃ sati kakārādīnāṃ cakārādibhiḥ samaṃ sāvarṇyaṃ syād iti nety ata āha, samānasthānānām iti | kaṇṭhādisthānīyānāṃ kakārādīnāṃ tālvādisthānīyaiś cakārādibhiḥ samaṃ sāvarṇyaṃ kathaṃ syād ity arthaḥ | tathā cāhuḥ śikṣākārāḥ, yasminn āsyapradeśe sthitās te śrūyante kaṇṭhe vorasi vā jihvāyāṃ vā tāluni mūrdhani dantamūleṣu dante vā dantoṣṭhayor voṣṭhayor vā nāsikayor vā tat sthānam | tiṣṭhater adhikaraṇe nañpratyaya iti | śvāsanādaghoṣādibhede pīti | śvāsanādaghoṣāḥ varṇadharmāḥ | tad uktaṃ sa eva prāṇo nāma karma ūrdhvam ākrāman mūrdhni pratihato nivṛtto yadā koṣṭham abhihanti | tadā koṣṭhe bhihitasya sato galabilasya saṃvṛtatvāt saṃvāro varṇadharma upajāyate vivṛtatvād vivāraḥ | saṃvṛte galabile nādaḥ | avyaktaś ca nādaḥ | vivṛte śvāsa uparivartī tau śvāsanādāv anupradānam ity ācakṣate | yadā sthānābhighātaje dhvanau nādo nupradīyate tadā nādadhvanisaṃsargād ghoṣaḥ | yadā śvāso nupradīyate | tadā śvāsadhvanisaṃsargād aghoṣo varṇadharma udetīti | ādigrahaṇād aghoṣagrahaṇam | atha vyañjanānāṃ sāvarṇye siddhe kim iṣṭaṃ syād ity ata āha | tena vaktetyādi sāvarṇyakathanena yadi vyañjanānāṃ sāvarṇyaṃ na syāt tadā cavargasya kir asavarṇe ity anena pṛcchatītyādu katvaṃ prasajyetety arthaḥ | uktam artham anyatrāpy atidiśati | evam antasthānām apīti | apiśabdo bhinnakramaḥ | sa cānunāsikyabhinnānām ity etasmād boddhavyaḥ | yad vā, yathāsthito 'pi śabdo mantavyaḥ | na kevalaṃ vyañjanānām antasthānām apīty arthaḥ | teneti sāvarṇyenety arthaḥ | antaratama iti | sadṛśatamaḥ sthānārthaguṇapramāṇebhya ity arthaḥ | sānunāsika iti | anunāsiko nāma varṇadharmas tadvān ity arthaḥ | tvaṃ ramasa ity atra parasavarṇo repha ādeśo makārasya mā bhūd ity evam arthaṃ sānunāsika eveti padam | yadi sānunāsika eveti padaṃ na prayuñjīta | tadā rephasya rephaḥ savarṇaḥ sambhaved ity āśaṅkayām akārasyāpi parasavarṇo repho bhavet | yady evam antasthā dviprabhedāḥ sānunāsikā niranunāsikāś ca rephoṣmāṇāṃ savarṇā na santīti vacanam anarthakaṃ | nānarthakaṃ tasya hi sānunāsiko rephaḥ svarṇo rephasya nāsti | niranunāsiko repho rephasya savarṇo bhavatīti tātparyāt |

nanv anyeṣāṃ mate ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ sāvarṇyaṃ yad asti, tad asmanmate katham ity ata āha, ṛdupadhād ityādi | yad vā savarṇa iti pūrvācāryasaṃjñāparigrahād eva samāno varṇaḥ savarṇa iti vyutpattyānyaḥ kaścid anyasya savarṇa ity arthavijñānād anyonyārthatvam avagamyate ity adhikam anyonyapadam ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ sāvarṇyaṃ bodhayati | atha prāguktam arthaṃ viśadayati | sati hi tasminn iti ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ sāvarṇye ity arthaḥ | hir yasmād arthe | tapara iti | taḥ paro yasmāt sa taparaḥ | tād api paras taparo varṇa ity arthaḥ | tatkālasyeti tatkāla iva kālo yasya sa tatkāla ity uttarapadalopī samāsaḥ | taparavarṇasahacaritakriyayā tulyakālasya yenodāttādinā viśiṣṭa uccāritas tato nyair udāttādibhir guṇaiḥ sambaddhasyety arthaḥ | nanu sa kālo 'sya bahuvrīhiḥ kasmān na vidhīyate | ucyate | atra kālaśabdena kriyāviśeṣaḥ kathyate | uktaṃ ca |
ādityagrahatārādi parispandam athāpare ||
bhinnam āvṛttibhedena kālaṃ kālavido vidur
iti | evaṃ tacchabdena taparaparāmarśe sati taparo varṇaḥ kālaśabdena ca kriyāviśeṣaḥ kathita iti varṇakriyāviśeṣābhidhāyinos taparakālaśabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt | mātrikeṇeti | yāvatā kālenākṣṇor nimīṣonmeṣau bhavatas tāvad uccāraṇakriyākālo varṇāvayavo mātrā tadvatā hrasvenety arthaḥ | kḷpi pratiṣedha iti | kḷpi pratiṣedhasyānarthakyaṃ prasajyeta | tan mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ sāvarṇyajñāpanaphalakaḥ kḷpi pratiṣedho yujyata ity arthaḥ | raśruter iti ra iti śrutir upalabdhir yasya sa raśrutī rephas tasyety arthaḥ | evaṃ laśrutir ity atrāpy ayam artho boddhavyaḥ | uktaṃ ca, nābhipradeśāt prayatnaprerito vāyuḥ prāṇo nāmordhvam ākramann uraḥprabhṛtīnāṃ sthānānām anyatamasmin sthāne prayatnena vidhāryante | sa vidhāryamāṇaḥ sthānam abhihanti | tasmāt sthānābhighātād dhvanir utpadyate | ākāśe sā varṇaśrutiḥ savarṇasyātmalābha iti | ṛkāre tu yāvad bhāgāv ādyantavantau, tanmadhye repho rdhamātrātmeti | yad vā, akḷpi cṛter iti jñāpakāt pratyayotpatteḥ prāg evāntaraṅgatvam ity ṛkārasya ḷkāraḥ | tataḥ kalptum icchatīti sanpratyayo vidheyaḥ |

nanv anantaratvād eva samānānām atrānuvṛttir bhaviṣyatīti teṣāṃgrahaṇaṃ vyartham iti cen na, anyaprayojanakatvāt tasya | tathā hi, yady atra teṣaṃgrahaṇaṃ na kuryāt tadā viśeṣātidiṣṭaḥ prakṛtaṃ na bādhate ity anayā paribhāṣayā varṇānuvṛttau satyāṃ tanmadhye dvayor dvayor varṇayoḥ saṃjñitvaṃ prāduṣṣyāt | tataś ca acīkhanad ity atrālope samānasyetyādi vacanena laghuni dhātvakṣare sanvadbhāvo na syāt, kakārakhakārayor anena savarṇasaṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ paro dīrgha iti prāptadīrghasaṃjñakasya khakārasya guroḥ parabhūtatvāt | teṣāṃgrahaṇena viśeṣātidiṣṭaparibhāṣāstīti jñāyate | anyathāsyānarthakyaṃ bhavet | tasmād atra varṇānuvṛttinivṛttaye teṣāṃgrahaṇam iti kecit | khanu avadhāraṇe khātavantaṃ prayuktavān_ iti dhātoś ca hetāv itīn | upadhādīrghaḥ | adyatanī diśridrusrukamikāritāntebhya iti caṇ | ino lopaḥ | iny asamāneti hrasvaḥ | caṇparokṣeti dviva | kavargasya cavarga iti khasya chaḥ | dvitīyacaturthayor iti chasya caḥ | alope samānasyetītvaṃ | dīrgho laghor iti dīrghaḥ | yat tu durgeṇa dvayor hrasvayor dvayor dīrghayoś ca savarṇasaṃjñāsidhyatv ity etadarthaṃ teṣāṃgraham abhidhāyi, tan na manoharam | yady apy evam abhidhīyate tathāpi hrasvavyaktīnāṃ dīrghavyaktīnām evānyonyaṃ savarṇasaṃjñā vyavatiṣṭhate na tu hrasvavyaktīnāṃ dīrghavyaktīnāṃ cānyonyaṃ dvau dvāv ity anena vacanena sanniveśasyāśrayaṇāt | yadi sanniveśo nāśrīyate, tadā yayoḥ kayościd dvayor dvayoḥ saṃjñā syāt | tataś ca, yathā hrasvadīrghayor laukikasāvarṇyābhāve pi vacanāt saṃjñā pravartate | iti ṭīkāyām uktaṃ | tathaivākāre akārāder api savarṇasaṃjñā pravartate | tathā ca samāno varṇaḥ savarṇa ity anvarthatve pi hrasvadīrghayor asamānayor api vacanabalāt savarṇasaṃjñā pravartate iti pañcikāyām uktaṃ | tathā hrasvadvaye dīrghadvaye cāpi kathanaṃ syād iti ||
div.l: pūrvo hrasvaḥ ||
div.p: pūrva parvapūraṇe pūrvatīti pūrvaḥ ac | arthavaśād iti prayojanavaśād ity arthaḥ | ṣaṣṭhyantam iti nirdhāraṇaṣaṣṭhyantaṃ sambandhaṣaṣṭhyantaṃ vety arthaḥ | atha dvau dvāv ity anuvṛttisāmarthyād bahavaḥ saṃjñinaḥ pratīyante ity agṛhītavīpsāko 'pi pūrvaśabdo vīpsāyāṃ gamayatīty ata āha, yo yaḥ pūrvaḥ sa hrasvasaṃjño bhavati |

nanu yacchabde ced vīpsā, tarhi tacchabde 'pi vīpsayā bhavitavyam | tataḥ sa sa hrasvasaṃjño bhavatīti vaktuṃ yujyate tat katham etad iti cet, ucyate | tacchabde vīpsā prāmāṇikair nādriyate | tathā ca dṛśyate
kalyāṇānāṃ tvam iha mahatām īśiṣe tvaṃ vidhatse
puṇyaṃ lakṣmīm atha mayi dṛśaṃ dehi deva prasīda |
yad yat pāpaṃ pratijahi jagannātha namrasya tan me
bhadraṃ bhadraṃ vitara bhagavan bhūyase maṅgalāya ||
uktaṃ ca cintāmaṇikāreṇa vīpsā ca yatpade na tu tatpade 'pi virūpasthitayor api tatpadena parāmarśād buddhisthavācakatvād iti na vyutpattivirodha iti | kvacit pustake sa sa hrasvasaṃjño bhavati iti pāṭho dṛśyate |
he ambda iti | ambāśabdaḥ heśabdaḥ pūrvaḥ | tasmāt sipratyayaḥ | tasyāvyayāś ceti luk | prathamaikavacanaṃ si | hrasvo mbārthānām iti hrasvaḥ | hrasvanadīti silopaḥ |

nanu ḷkārasya hrasvasaṃjñāyāṃ kiṃ phalam | ucyate | gasḷṃmanya ity atra makārāgamaḥ | anyathā katham atra hrasvāruṣor mo 'nta iti makārāgamaḥ syāt | yat tu ṭīkāyāṃ ḷkārasya hrasvasaṃjñāphalaṃ hekḷ ity evaṃ vivakṣayā hrasvanadīsilopa uktas tad asamīcīnam | ṛkāragrahaṇena ḷkārasya grahaṇāt ghuṭi cety anenārādeśaḥ pravartate iti |

nanv iha pūrvasya laghusaṃjñayāpi vyavahāro dṛśyate | sa katham ity āha, arthavaśād iti | hrasvaśabdasya yo 'rtho laghur ity etadrūpas tasya vaśa āyattatvaṃ tasmād ity arthaḥ | kvacid iti kvacin mate kvacit pradeśe vety arthaḥ | svamate tu hrasva iti pūrvācāryasaṃjñāparigraheṇa laghur iti saṃjñāntaraṃ dyotyate | yat tu durgeṇa laghunā kālena pūrvasyoccāraṇāl laghuvyapadeśaḥ siddha iti kathitaṃ tan na manoharam | yady evam abhidhīyate, tadā hrasvakāloccāraṇayogād dhrasvasaṃjñāpi sidhyatīty etat sūttraṃ na kartavyaṃ syād iti | tasmāt pūrvoktayuktyā laghusaṃjñāvyavahārāya saṅgrāhyā asyāphalam acīkḷpad ity atra sanvadbhāvaḥ | ḷkārasya laghutvābhāve sanvadbhāvo na bhavet |

kaścid āha, uktibādhayā pūrvasyopalabdhir bhavatīti pūrvagrahaṇaṃ sukhārtham | kecit tu dvau dvāv ity asyaivānuvṛttyarthaṃ pūrvagrahaṇam ācakhyuḥ | anyathā prakṛtānāṃ samānānām evānuvṛttau satyām apekṣayā pūrvatvanaiyatyaṃ na bhavet | tan no manoharam | samānānuvṛttipakṣe savarṇasaṃjñāyāḥ prāg idaṃ sūtradvayaṃ kuryāt | tathā daśa samānāḥ hrasvaḥ paro dīrghaḥ ||
div.l: paro dīrghaḥ svaraḥ ||
div.p: prū pālanapūraṇayoḥ pipartīti pacāditvād ac | nāmyantayor iti guṇaḥ | arthavaśād iti prayojanavaśāt | prayojanaṃ ca sandhyakṣarāṇāṃ dīrghatvasiddhiḥ | paraśabdo 'trānyārtho na tu deśaviśeṣavṛttir ity āha, hrasvād anya iti | vṛkṣāṇām ityādi ām | āmi ca nur iti nuḥ | dīrgham āmi sanāv iti dīrghaḥ | parjanyavallakṣaṇapravṛttyeti | yathā meghasya jalena rikte pūrṇe ca pradeśe 'bhivarṣaṇāya pravṛttis tathā sūttrāṇām anekakāryārthaṃ pravṛttir ity arthaḥ |

nanu sandhyakṣarāṇāṃ dīrghābhāve kim aniṣṭam āpadyetety ata āha, asati hīti | hiśabdo yasmādarthe niścaye vā | atiri iti | kulam iti śeṣaḥ | rāyam atikrāntam iti vigrahaḥ | atinu | jalam iti śeṣaḥ | nāvo 'tikrāntam iti | hrasvavat sthānasāvarṇyād iti | yathā atirītyādau | e ai kaṇṭhyatālavyau | o au kaṇṭhyoṣṭhyāv ity aikārasya tālavyatvād ikāraḥ | aukārasyauṣṭhyatvād ukāro hrasvo bhavati | tathā rave raśmir ityādau ro re lopam ity anena dīrgho yathākramaṃ dvayor īkāro dvayor ūkāraś ca prasajyeyātām ity arthaḥ | yathā sandhyakṣarāṇāṃ paro dīrghaḥ svara iti | atiri atinu ityādau edotau tālavyauṣṭhabhāgayor bhūyastvād ikāra ukārāv eva hrasvau bhavataḥ | na tu kaṇṭhyo 'kāraḥ, tadbhāgasyālpatvāt | rāyam atikrāntam atiri kulaṃ | nāvam atikrāntam atinu jalam iti vigrahaḥ | svaro hrasva iti hrasvaḥ |

aṣṭau sthānāni varṇānām uraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiras tathā |
jihvāmūlaṃ ca dantāś ca nāsikoṣṭhau ca tālu ca ||
akuhavisarjanīyāḥ kaṇṭhyāḥ | icuyaśās tālavyāḥ | ṛṭuraṣā mūrdhanyāḥ | ḷtulasā dantyāḥ | upūpadhmānīyāḥ oṣṭhyāḥ | e ai kaṇṭhyatālavyau | o au kaṇṭhyoṣṭhyau | vakāro dantyaḥ | anusvāra yamā nāsikyāḥ | jihvāmūlīyo jihvāmūlīyaḥ | tatsājātyād iti | samānajātir yasya sa sajātis tasya bhāvaḥ sājātyaṃ | tena kaṇṭhyatvena sājātyaṃ tasmāt | bhūyaseti | avayavenety arthaḥ | tālavyoṣṭhyeti | tāluni bhavaḥ tālavyaḥ | digāditvād yaḥ | adhyardhamātreti | adhikam ardhaṃ yasyāḥ sā adhyardhā sā cāsau mātreti |
tathā rāyam icchatīti | tathāśabdaḥ samuccaye | tathā te cchātrā iti | tatheti sandhyakṣarāṇāṃ dīrghatve kṛte ity arthaḥ |

ihāpy arthagrahaṇād iti | dīrghaśabasya yo 'rtho gurutvarūpas tasya grahaṇaṃ tasmāt | īheti | īkārasya dīrghatve sati gurutvād etad udāharaṇam | tena rakṣeti | tena saṃyoge pare laghor api gurusaṃjñāyāṃ satyām ity arthaḥ | hiṃseti | tṛhihisi hiṃsāyām | ikāro nakārāgamārthaḥ | anidanubandheti jñāpakān nakārāgamaḥ ||
div.l: avarṇavarjo nāmī ||
div.p: vṛjī varjane | svaradeś cetīn | avarṇaṃ varjayitveti karmaṇy aṇ ||
div.l: ekārādīni sandhyakṣarāṇi ||
div.p: ekāra ādir yeṣāṃ tāni | svarānuvṛttyā catvāry eva varṇāni sandhyakṣarasaṃjñāni bhavanti | e ai o au | prayojanaṃ sandhyakṣarāntānām ityādi | deṅ rakṣaṇe | daip śodhane | do avakhaṇḍane | dātā | aukārasya sandhyakṣarasaṃjñayā āruttare ca vṛddhir iti vṛddhisaṃjñā | aupagavaḥ |
śuklavāsasam ānayety atra yathopalakṣaṇabhūtasyāpi vāsasa ānayanaṃ tadvad ekārasyāpi saṃjñā bhavati | evaṃ gargādirājādiprabhṛtiṣv ādiśabdaparigṛhītānāṃ gargādirājādiśabdānāṃ kāryatvaṃ jñeyam ||

vyañjante upaskriyante svarā ebhir iti karaṇe yuṭ | tvaṃ hara iti | hṛñ_ haraṇe | harati pāpānīti ac | kṣi kṣaye | gatyarthākarmaketi ktaḥ | niṣṭhāyāṃ ceti dīrghaḥ | kṣer dīrghād iti tasya natvam | yaḥ kṣīṇa ity atra | akuhavisarjanīyaḥ kaṇṭhya iti sthānasāvarṇyāt samānaḥ savarṇa ityādinā dīrghaḥ | na vyañjane svarā ity anena visarjanīyasya vyañjanatvān niṣidhyate | syād ity arthaḥ | yady evaṃ, nāmiparo ram ity asya vaiyarthyaṃ syād iti cen na | tasyeroḥ pravṛttyarthatvāt | yad vaitat kasyacin matam āśrityoktam |

anusvārasya vyañjanakāryaviśeṣam āha | anusvārasya cetyādi | anyajātīyais svaraiḥ sannikarṣavatāṃ vyañjanānāṃ saṃyogasaṃjñeti hiṃsety atrānusvārasakārasamudāye saṃyoge pare her ikārasya gurutve jāte guroś ca niṣṭhāyāṃ seṭa ity anena akārādeśo bhavatīty arthaḥ | bhinnajātīyair ity asya vivaraṇaṃ svarair iti | anyathā, svarair ity anenaiva gatārthatvād vyarthatvaṃ prasajyetety arthaḥ | athavā, bhinnajātīya eva vyavadhāyako bhavatīti pratipādanārthaṃ bhinnajātīyair iti vacanam | avyavyahitānīti | avidyamānaṃ vyavahitaṃ yeṣām tānīti vigrahaḥ | vyavahitaṃ vyavadhānam antaraṃ varṇaśūnyaḥ kāla ity anarthāntaram | yad vā na vyavahitāni avyavahitānīti kāryam |
pūrvavad iti | yathā pūrvasūtre upalakṣaṇabhūtasya ekārasya saṃjñā, tathātrāpi kakārasyety arthaḥ | kakārasya vyañjanasaṃjñāyā abhāve skoḥ saṃyogādyor ityāder asaṅgatiḥ syād iti bhāvaḥ ||

tad_ jaś | tyadādyatvam | jas sarva īm | vṛjeḥ vṛjyante vijātīyebhyaḥ pṛthak kriyanta iti karmaṇi ghañ | guṇaḥ cajoẖ kagāv iti gatvam | pañcan_ jaśo luk | dīrghādikaṃ pūrvavat | pañca pañceti vigrahaḥ | ākhyātāc ca tamādaya iti śas | sa ca vīpsāyāṃ tadantāc cāsmāt sāmānyenotpannasya sipratyayasya avyayāc ceti luk |

nanu pūrvavastuparāmarśitayā tacchabdena kādīni parāmṛśyante tadā tāni vargāḥ iti napuṃsakena nirdeśaḥ syāt | na ca prasiddhārthatvam atra ghaṭate | tat kathaṃ te vargā iti puṃliṅganirdeśa ity ata āha, yan mukhaṃ sa candra itivad iti | yathā 'ropaṇena yan mukham iti napuṃsakaliṅgena mukhena sa candra ity asya puṃliṅgasya sambandhas tathātrāpīty arthaḥ | yad vā prakrāntaprakramyamānayor liṅgaṃ sarvanāmāni śrūyante iti kādīnīty asya liṅgaṃ vihāya prakramyamānasya vargā ity asya ta ity anena liṅgaṃ gṛhītaṃ yathā, ya ādhāras tad adhikaraṇam ity adoṣaḥ | bhinnaliṅgenāpīti | na kevalam abhinnaliṅgenety aper arthaḥ | yad vā, apiśabdo bhinnakramaḥ sambhāvanārthaḥ | sa cānvaya iti padena sambandhanīyaḥ | tenānvayaḥ sambhavatīty artho bhavati |

nanu kavargo yaṃ cavargo yam ityādivyavahāraḥ kathaṃ siddhyatīty ata āha, prāthamyād iti | svasmin svasmin varge prathamam uktatvād ity arthaḥ | prādhānyāc ceti | prādhānyaṃ caiṣāṃ bahulaprayogadvārā, na tu khachādīnām ity arthaḥ | atha vālpaprāṇatayaiṣāṃ prādhānyaṃ | yad vā caśabdas tv arthaḥ | tenaiṣāṃ prādhānyaṃ katham ity atra hetuḥ prāthamyād iti | yad vā, prāthamyād ity asya vyākhyānaṃ prādhānyād iti |
yanteti | yamu uparame | śvastanī tā | vargye vargānta iti masya naḥ |

nanu kādaya evānantaratvād anuvartiṣyante | tat kiṃ ta iti padena prayojanam | ucyate, viśeṣādiṣṭaḥ prakṛtaṃ na bādhate iti varṇānuvṛttau satyām akārādīnāṃ varṇasaṃjñāsambandhe tvam asi ityādau vargye tadvargapañcamaṃ veti vargapañcame makārasyokārādau jāte niṣṭhaṃ rūpaṃ prasajyeteti tan mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti ta iti padam |

atha śaso nirdeśe kiṃ prayojanam | yadi śasaṃ na nirdiśet tadā vīpsāyogo na syāt tataḥ pañcānāṃ kādīnām eva varṇasaṃjñā bhaved iti cen na | evaṃ sati vargā iti bahuvacanasya nairarthakyaṃ prasajyeta | bahutve sati hi bahutvavacanam upapadyate | tac ca bahutvaṃ kim apekṣya syāt pañcānām ekavargasaṃjñākaraṇāt | kiñ ca, yadi kādīnām eva pañcānāṃ vargasaṃjñā bhavet tadā pañceti saṃjñāviśeṣaṇaṃ niṣprayojanaṃ bhavet | tataḥ pañca vargāḥ kādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ niṣphalā iti pañcaśabde kādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇabhūte sāmarthyād eva vīpsāyogo vijñāsyata iti śaso nirdeśaḥ kimarthakaḥ | satyam etat | kintu pañca pañceti kṛte sya parigṛhītavīpsākasyaiva kādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇatvam iti kasyacid āśaṅkā syāt | tataś ca pañca saṅkhyāvacchedaḥ saṃjñānāṃ na prāpnuyād evaṃ ca yakārādīnām api pañcānāṃ vargasaṃjñā syād iti tannirāsārthaḥ śaso nirdeśaḥ | durgas tu te vargāḥ pañca pañceti sūtraṃ paṭhati | te pañcāmaṃ vargā iti siddhe vispaṣṭārtham idam ||

dvayoḥ pūraṇo dvitīyaḥ | dves tīyaḥ | ghuṣir_ viśabdane | bhāve ghañ | avidyamāno ghoṣo yeṣāṃ te aghoṣāḥ | lopyā ity arhapratyayanirdeśād vidyamānaśabdasya lopaḥ | ghoṣaś ca kaścid varṇadharma udāttādir ivocyate | yat tu ṭīkāpañcikayoḥ na vidyate ghoṣo dhvanighoṣām ity aghoṣāḥ | īṣadarthe tra nañ | anudarā kanyetivad ity abhihitaṃ tad asamañjasam | saṃvāravivārādivarṇadharmatulyakakṣyatvenāsya ghoṣasya śikṣākārair nirdeśāt |

vargāṇām iti sambandhaṣaṣṭhī, na tu nirdhāraṇe, vargāṇāṃ madhye prathamadvitīyau nirdhāryamāṇau vargāv iti dvivacanaprasaṅgāt | sambandhaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu kādīnāṃ bahutvād bahuvacanaṃ saṅgacchate | etad evābhipretyāha, vargāṇāṃ ye iti | tathā śaṣasāś ceti | tathāśabdaḥ sādṛśye yathā prathamadvitīyāḥ aghoṣasaṃjñās tathā śaṣasāś cety arthaḥ |

dṛṣatkalpeti | īṣadasamāptā dṛṣat | dṛṣatkalpā | ākhyātāc ca tamādaya iti kalpap | aghoṣe prathama iti dasya taḥ | iccheti nipātyate | iṣe śaḥ | guṇābhāvaḥ | chatvaṃ ca | tena dvirbhāve aghoṣe prathama iti chasya caḥ | samid_ su | dasya taḥ |

vargāṇām ādyau varṇau śaṣasāś cāghoṣā iti siddhe yat prathamadvitīyagrahaṇaṃ karoti, tat prathamadvitīyādayo vargāṇām eva dharmā iti jñāpayati | vargaprathamā iti siddhe yadvargāṇām eva nirdeśaḥ kṛtas tatsthāne ntaratama ity astīti jñāpayati | anyathā tasya nairarthakyaṃ bhavet | yady api śaṣasaprathamadvitīyā vargāṇām iti kṛte sādhyaṃ sidhyati | tathāpi saṃjñināṃ bhedena nirdeśo vispaṣṭābhāvanirāsārthaḥ | vargāṇām iti tu sukhārthaṃ pūrvasūtrād anuvartamānasya vargagrahaṇasyehārthavaśāt ṣaṣṭhyantatayāvagamāt ||

ghoṣo vidyate yeṣām iti | tad asyāstīti mantvādyā iti saṃsaṅge vantuḥ | yat tu pañcikādau atiśāyane vantur uktas tan na ghaṭate, saṃsaṅga eva vantor ucitatvāt | yathā rūpavān paṭa iti ghoṣo hi varṇadharmaḥ | anyaśabdāj jas | jas sarva īm | anuvāde rthaprakāśasya vidyamānatvāt saṃjñinaḥ paratve 'pi doṣo nāsti, yathā, ayaṃ gaur gaur ayam iti |

pañcamyantam iti pañcamībahuvacanāntam ity arthaḥ | anyaśabdasyāvadhisāpekṣakatve sati vargaprathamāḥ padāntā ity atra svaragrahaṇasya vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt svarāṇām avadhitvaṃ nāstīty anantaratvād avāptavyañjanasaṃjñikāṇām aghoṣāṇām evāvadhitvaṃ yuktam ity āha, aghoṣebhyo ye 'nye vyañjanasaṃjñakā varṇā iti | vṛkṣābhyām iti | akāro dīrgham iti dīrghaḥ |

nanu yady aghoṣavyatiriktānāṃ vyañjanānām iyaṃ saṃjñā, tadā visarjanīyasyāpi bhaviṣyatīti nety āha, visarjanīyasyeti | nanv evaṃ sati kim aniṣṭaṃ syād ity ata āha, yadi syād iti | evaṃ sati varṇasamāmnāyā iti vidadhyād ity arthaḥ | nanu sakārasthāne visargasya kṛtatvāt sthānivadbhāvena sakārasyāghoṣatvād eva neyaṃ ghoṣavatsaṃjñā bhaviṣyatīti kimarthaṃ jñāpakāśrayaṇam iti cen na | sthānivadbhāvasyātrānuktatvāt | avarṇavidhāv iti niṣedhāt | sakāraṃ varṇam āśritya hi visarjanīyalakṣaṇasya vidheḥ kriyamāṇatvād varṇavidhitvam |

jihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyayor neyaṃ saṃjñety āha, jihvāmūlīyetyādi | anayoḥ parāśritatvena bahiraṅgatvam iti ghoṣavatsaṃjñā nāsti | anyathā, kathaṃ yaẖ karoti sa kartā 'paḫ piba ityādau dīrghābhāvaḥ syād ity arthaḥ | asiddham ityādi | prakṛteḥ pūrvam antaraṅgaṃ prakṛteḥ paraṃ bahiraṅgam ity antaraṅge dīrghe kartavye bahiraṅgaṃ jihvāmūlīyādikṛtam apy asiddham akṛtavad ity arthaḥ | atha vā jihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyayor varṇasamāmnāye pāṭhābhāvād varṇatvaṃ nāstīti tayor ghoṣavatsaṃjñā na bhavatīti | ata eva vṛttikṛtā vyañjanasaṃjñakā varṇā ity uktam | varṇasthānitayā tv anayor varṇavyapadeśo gauṇaḥ |

athānusvārasya ghoṣavadvyapadeśe prayojanābhāvān neyaṃ saṃjñety āha, anusvārasya cetyādi | prayojanābhāvam eva prakaṭayati na hītyādi vastutaḥ | anyagrahaṇaṃ sukhārtham | na cānantarāṇām aghoṣāṇām evaiṣā saṃjñā syād iti vācyam | pṛthag yogārambhāt | aghoṣaghoṣavatsaṃjñayoś caikavarṇaviṣayatvena viruddhatvāt | svarāṇāṃ cāpy eṣā saṃjñā na bhavati, aprastutatvāt ||
div.l: || anunāsikā ṅañaṇanamāḥ ||
